22b8('bum): cho 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ming bstan pa tsam gyis rlom sems dang ldan pa sems bskyed cing / mying tsas brjod pa des byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la brnyas bya dang/ 
23a1('bum): 'phya ba dang / khyad du gsod pa'i sems bskyed pa de ni de bas kyang shin tu lci ba ste/ sems bskyed pa de ni de bas kyang shin tu lci bar rig par bgyi/ rab 'byor de ltar ming bstan pas bdud kyi las shin tu/ 
23a2('bum): phra ba de lta bu dag bskyed pas de ni de bas// rab 'byor da ltung ba'i rtsa ba lci ba bzhi po lnga zhog gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i mying bstan pa tsam gyis rlom sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa de ni 'tshams myang
23a3('bum): pa lnga pas shin tu lci ba ste/ sems bskyed pa de ni de bas shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dben pa'i yon tan ston cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du/ 
23a4('bum): nye bar 'ongs te/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni dben pa'iyon tan gsum po zhes zer te/ rab 'byor dngas ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa 'am nags 'ad ba'i/ 
23a5('bum): bas mtha'i gnas dben par ma bshad do// gsol pa bcom lnga na 'das gal te de ltar dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang bas ma tha'i gnas dben pa ma lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dang
23a6('bum): chen po'i dben pa gzhan ni gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te
23a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dben na/ dgon pa dang nags 'dab dang / bas mtha'i gnas na rnam par spyod pa yin te/ rab 'byor da 'di ni sa
23a8('bum): nibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ngas gnang ba'o// gal te dben pa 'dis nyin mtshan du rnam par spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub seMs
23b1('bum): dpa'i dben pas dben pa'i rnam par spyod pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa dang nags 'dab dang rnabs mtha'i gnas na rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i ming
23b2('bum): la bya ba dang 'dres par rnam par spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mi dben par rnam par spyod pa yin no// gal te grong na spyod kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma 'dres na
23b3('bum): byang chub kyi mus dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dben par rnam par spyod pa yin no// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la dben pa'i rnam pa de lnga ngas gnang ba las drangs shing / bdud
23b4('bum): sdig can dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang / bas mtha'i gnas rnam par spyod cig ces dben par ston to// de dben pa des 'du 'ar gyur cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i yid
23b5('bum): bya ba dang 'dres pa de ma yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la brtson pa yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// de de ltar rnam par spyod pa des rnam par
23b6('bum): spyod cing yid la bya ba yongs su ma dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grong 'dab na rnam par spyod ci yid la bya ba yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i nyan thos kyi sems dang ma 'dres pa rang sangs
23b7('bum): rgyas kyi sems dang ma 'dres pa/ de ma yin pa'i sdig pa'i glegs gzhan dang ma 'dres pa/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par zhes pa yongs su rdzos
23b8('bum): par gyur pa ngag brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/ thabs mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bas dgon pa sbrul dang ri dgas dang bya yod pa/ rkun po yod pa dang / skye ga can yod pa dang / gcan zan men
24a1('bum): be can dang srin po rgyu ba dang / dpag tshad brgya tsam du 'phags pa/ de lta bu'i nang na 'dug cing / lo gcig gam brgya 'am/ lo sdong ngam lo brgya phrag stong ngam/ lo bye ba stong ngam/ lo bye ba brgya
24a2('bum): phrag stong ngam/ lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhag par gnas su zin kyang dben pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par gnas shing rna bar
24a3('bum): stong pa de lta bu'i dben pa shes par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang po dang 'dres pa nyid du rnam par spyod par 'gyur te/ 
24a4('bum): dben pa de la yang dag par ma brtses par gnas par gnas shing chag ngas pa dang / zhen cing mngon par zhen pa de tsam gis ni nga'i sems/ ngas par mi 'gyur te/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen
24a5('bum): bo rnams la dben pa de dang mi ldan pas dben pa de la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dben pa de dang bral ba'i phyir te/ de ltar de'i drung du bdud sdig can nye bar 'ongs shing steng gi bar snang
24a6('bum): la gnas te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dben pa ma nor ba yin gyi khyod dben pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyod cig/ des khyod myur du bla na myed pa yang
24a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes zer na/ de'i rgyus de dben pa de bas kyang dpon pa de gces par 'dzin cing phyir grong 'dab du 'ongs nas dge slong byang chub sos/ 
24a8('bum): nga ba'i theg pa pa'i sems dang yi sa bya ba yongs su dag pa des dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gzhan la me dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'dra 'dzi'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par sbed do zhes khyad du brjod cing byang chug ses/ 
24b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben par spyod pa de dag la 'du 'jis rnam par spyod par skyon du gdags pa dang / 'dres par rnam par rnam par spyod pas skyon du gdags par brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de// gang 'du
24b2('bum): 'dzi'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod pa de dag la ni dben pas rnam par spyod par 'dzin cing de dag la rim 'gro bskyed do// gang la rim 'gro bskyed par bya ba de dag la ni nga rgyal bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
24b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar bdag ni mi ma yin pa'i skul ba'o// mi ma yin pas dran par bya'o// rnam par spyod pa gang gis bdag spyad pa de ni rnam par spyod pa mo nor ba ste/ grog 'dab na spyod pa lnga su zhig bskul bar 'gyur/ 
24b4('bum): grong 'dab na spyod pa lta bu zhig dran par 'gyur zhes nga rgyal bskyed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i darigs kyi bu gzhan dag la smad par byed de/ rab 'byor nga gang zag/ 
24b5('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpa' rdol bar rig par bya'o// byang chub ses dpa' sun 'byin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bsnyen du rig par bya'o// de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
24b6('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi rkun po ste/ de ni 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i dge sbyong gi cha byad du rkun por rig par bya'o// ngang tshul de lta bu dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
24b7('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de dag gis bsnyen par mi bya'o// bsnyen par mi bya'o// rim 'gror ma bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang zag de lta bu dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rig par bya ste/ 
24b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyang yongs su ma btang la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su ma btang la byang chub sems dpa'
25a1('bum): dpa' chen po bsam pa thag pa nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa nges gang zag de lta bu'i
25a2('bum): ngang tshul can du bsnyen par mi bya/ bsten par mi bya/ rim 'gror mi bya'i rang gi don dang ldan par 'gyur ba la brtson par bya ste/ 'khor ba lnga rtag tu skye zhing 'jigs pa'i yid kyis khams gsum pa dang ma 'dres
25a3('bum): par spyad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rdol pa de la yang byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ de nyid la yang snying brtse ba'i phyir snying rje bskyed par bya'o// dga' ba dang btang snyoms bskyed par bya'o// des
25a4('bum): sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ ci nas kyang bdag ginyes pa 'a de dag thams cad du thams cad myed cing mi skye bar 'gyur ba de lta ra bya'o/ gal te skyes can yang myur du spang bar bya'o zhes slab tar
25a5('bum): bya ste/ rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen po rnams kyi rang gis khong du chud pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthur rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
25a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes nyen dag la bsnyen par bya'o// bsten pa bya'o// 
25a7('bum): rim 'gror bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorang
25a8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byang chub so/ 
25b1('bum): dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga nyan thos gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brjod cing ston pa dang / 'chad cing 'brel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag/ 
25b2('bum): par ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
25b3('bum): rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub
25b4('bum): sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen du ri dag par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// 
25b5('bum): dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen
25b6('bum): du rig par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs/ 
25b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// bsam rten bzhi ni// 
25b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// tshad myed pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// 
26a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sos
26a2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig pa bya'o/ 
26a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub
26a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshesanyen du rig par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes nyen du rig par
26a5('bum): bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnas ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po/ 
26a6('bum): rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni
26a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes
26a8('bum): gnyen du rig par bya'o// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
26b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sbyor
26b2('bum): mdzod zlo'i shes pa'o// shes rab bo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni dpung nyen no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyabs so// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni 'gon no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o// pha rol tu phyin pa
26b3('bum): drug ni pha'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni ston par rig par bya ste/ stong pa nyid thams cad ni lam mo// stong pa nyid thams cad ni sdang ba'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni sgron ma'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni zla'o// 
26b4('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes po'o/ stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes rab bo// sdong pa nyid thams cad ni dpung gnyen no// sdong pa nyid thams cadra ni skyab so// stong pa nyid thams cad ni 'gon no// stong pa nyid thas cad
26b5('bum): ni ma'o// stong pa nyid thams cad ni pha'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sngo na par bya ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni lom ni/ dran pa nye bar
26b6('bum): bzhag pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni spyon na ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi na dpung gnyen no/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni skyabaso// dran pa nye ba
26b7('bum): bzhag pa bzhi ni 'gon no// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni ma'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni pha'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ 
26b8('bum): yang dag par spong bzhi ni lam mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni snang ba'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni dpung gnyen no/ yang dag par
27a1('bum): spong ba bzhi ni skyabs so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni 'gon no// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni ma'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
27a2('bum): rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ni lam mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// bla' shes pa'o// shes rab bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni dpung chem
27a3('bum): rmad rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni skyabs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'gon no// rdzu 'phrul gi bzhi ni ma'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni pha'o// dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
27a4('bum): ston par rig par bya ste/ dbang po lnga ni lam mo// dbang po lnga ni snang ba'o// dbang po lnga ni sgron ma'o// blo'i shes pa'o shes rab bo// dbang po lnga ni dpung gnyen no// dbang po lnga ni skyabs so// dab
27a5('bum): tho lnga ni 'gon no// dbang po lnga ni ma'o// dbang po lnga ni pa'o// stsos lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sde na par rig par bya ste/ stobs lnga ni lam mo// stobs lnga ni sAng
27a6('bum): ba'o/ stobs lnga ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o// shes rab bo// stobs lnga ni dpung nyen no// stobs lnga ni skyabs so// stobs lnga ni 'gon no// stobs lnga ni ma'o// stobs lnga ni pha'o// byang chub kyi sanA
27a7('bum): lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ byang chub gi yan lag bdun ni lam mo/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni snang ba'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ 
27a8('bum): sgron ma 'o/ zla'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni dpung gnyen no// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni skyabs so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni 'gon no// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni mdo
27b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni pha'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni la mo
27b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snang ba'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dpung gnyen no// 'phags pa'i
27b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa ni skyabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'gon no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni pha'o// 
27b4('bum): bam po gsum pa'o// // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par
27b5('bum): rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snang ba'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnas ni sgron ma'o/ blo'o// shes pa'o shes rab bo/ 'phags pa'i bden
27b6('bum): pa rnams ni dpung nyen no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni skyabaso// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'gon no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni pha'o// bsam gtan
27b7('bum): rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya'o// bsam rten rnams ni lam mo// bsam rten rnams ni snang ba'o// bsam rten rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes
27b8('bum): rang za ni bsam gtan rnams ni dpung gnyen no// bsam gtan rnams ni skyabs so// bsam rten rnams ni 'gon no// bsam rten rnams ni ma'o// bsam gtan rnams ni pha'o// tshad myed pa rnam sa ni byang / 
28a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ tshad myed pa rnams ni lam mo// tshad myed pa rnams ni snang ba'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes raro// 
28a2('bum): tshad myed pa rnams ni dpung nyan no// tshad myed pa rnams ni skyabs so// tshad myed pa rnams ni 'gon no// tshad myed pa rnams ni ma'o// tshad myed pa rnams pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni byang chub/ 
28a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni lam mo// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snang ba'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
28a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dpung nyen no// gzugs ma dra ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni skyab so// gzugs myed pa'i skyes
28a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni 'gon no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa/ 'jug pa rnams ni ma'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa rnams ni pha'o// rnam par thar pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpases
28a6('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni lam mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o// shes rab bo// rnam par
28a7('bum): thar pa brgyad ni dpung rten no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni skyabs so// rnam por thar pa brgyad ni 'gon no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ma'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni pa'o// mtha mags gnas pa'i snyoms par/ 
28a8('bum): 'jug pa dgu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya'o// mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni lam mo// mthar gis gnas pa'i skyes par 'jug par chu ni
28b1('bum): sdang ba'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab po/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dpung nyen no/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jun
28b2('bum): po 'jug pa dgu ni skyab so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni 'gon no// mthar gyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma'o// mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni pha'o// rnam pa
28b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni
28b4('bum): mamam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa/ dang smon pa myed pa ni snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyidadu/ mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myed pa ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes po'o/ 
28b5('bum): shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni dpung nyan no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni skyab so// rnam par thar pa'i
28b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni 'gon no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma snyed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni ma'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan mo myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni
28b7('bum): thatsho// mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam mo// mngon par shes pa rnams ni snang ba'o// mngon par shes pa rjos/ 
28b8('bum): rno smon mdzad zla'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// mngon par shes pa rnams ning dpung nyen no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni skyabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni 'gon no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma'o// mngon por gleg
29a1('bum): rnams ni ma'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni pha'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni lam mo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snang ba'o// 
29a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dpung nyen no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni skyabaso// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni 'gon no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma'o// ting nge 'dzin rnaMs ni pha'o// gzungs
29a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni lam mo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snang ba'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o // shes raba'o// 
29a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dpung nyan no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni skyabs/ gzungs kyi sgo nas ni 'gon no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma'o// gzu dngas kyi sgo rnams ni pha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang
29a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni lam mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni snang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni
29a6('bum): sgron ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes/ rab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dpung nyen no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni skyabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni 'gon no// de bzhin shegs pa'i stobs
29a7('bum): bcu ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni pha'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni snang po'o
29a8('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// bla'o shes pa'o shes bya bo/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dpung nyen no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni skyab so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni 'gon no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni pha'o// 
29b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni lam mo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// so so yang dag par rig
29b2('bum): pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// bloH'o shes pa'o shes rab bo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni skyab so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni 'gon no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi/ 
29b3('bum): ni ma'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pha'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni lam
29b4('bum): rmo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sgo ma'o// blo'o shes pa'o shes rab po// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dpung gnyen no/ sangs
29b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni skyabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni 'gon no/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phol
29b6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam mo// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snang ba'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni
29b7('bum): sman mar/ blol zhes par shes rab bo// lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni 'gon no// lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid ni ma'o// ma ma
29b8('bum): rnam pa zhing ni ba'o rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bgacags kyi 'ams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir nas/ rab byor dade ni 'di ltar byang chub tu phyogs kyi chos sum cu cu bdur po 'di
30a1('bum): 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yab dang yum du gyur to// rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos/ 
30a2('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yab dang yum du gyur to// rab 'byor byang chub
30a3('bum): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po de dag ni da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yab dang yum du gyur to// 
30a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ rab 'byor nga de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed/ 
30a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems
30a6('bum): can pa rnams bsdud par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor da ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni
30a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang / pha dang ma dang dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang 'gon yin no zhes zer ro// rab 'byor de de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par
30a8('bum): bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsamo gcad par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongasasu smin par bya bar
30b1('bum): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstand to// 
30b2('bum): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal pa/ rab 'byorang na mkha' ltar chags pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
30b3('bum): phyi nang pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'i
30b4('bum): mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis s+ho/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod/ 
30b5('bum): pa'i tshen nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni/ chos thams cad kyis dben po'o// chos thams cad ni chos thams cad
30b6('bum): kyis sdong pa'o// rab 'byorang rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor kyis
30b7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang dben la chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/ sems can rnams kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang 'di ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom
30b8('bum): ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur/ dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na myed pa yang dag par
31a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la chos gang yang myi dmyigs/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu myi
31a2('bum): dmyigs na/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba
31a3('bum): la spyad dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bdag du bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing / kun tu 'khod par gyurd to// bcom ldan 'das
31a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar na sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa yod/ pa yin te/ gang la bdag tu bya ba myed pa de la 'dzin pa myed gang / la 'dzin pa myed pa de la sems can kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor ba myed de/ 
31a5('bum): de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang myed pas/ rab 'byor de de ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni
31a6('bum): gzugs la myi spyod/ tshor ba la myi spyod/ 'du shes la myi spyod/ 'du byed la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ mig la mi spyod/ rna ba la mi spyod/ sna la mi spyod/ lce la mi spyod/ lus la mi spyod/ yid la mi spyod/ 
31a7('bum): gzugs la myi spyod/ sgra la myi spyod/ dri la myi spyod/ ro la myi spyod/ reg la myi spyod/ chos la myi spyod// myig gi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ 
31a8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myi spyod// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na lce'i
31b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod/ yid gi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod// myig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myi spyod/ rna ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ sna'i dus/ 
31b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la mi spyod do// sa'i khas
31b3('bum): la mi spyod/ chu'i khams la mi spyod/ me'i khams la mi spyod/ rlung gi khams la mi spyod/ na mkha'i khams la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi spyod// ma rig pa la mi spyod/ 'du mi byed la mi spyod/ rnam pa
31b4('bum): shes pa la mi spyod/ ming dang dang gzugs la mi spyod/ skye mched drug de la mi spyod/ reg pa la mi spyod/ tshor ba la mi spyod/ sred pa la mi spyod/ len pa la mi spyod/ srid pa la mi spyod/ skye ba la mi spyod// 
31b5('bum): rga shi la mi spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la mi spyod/ rgyu/ la khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha ro// lad tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi/ 
31b6('bum): spyod/ bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// nang stong pa nyid la mi sbyong / phyi stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi
31b7('bum): spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyad/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ thog ma thog ma pa
31b8('bum): tho ma myed pa myed pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mi spyong/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ mi dmyigs pa
32a1('bum): stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi spyod/ yang dag pa
32a2('bum): spong ba rnams la mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod/ dbang po rnams la mi spyod/ stobs rnams la mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod
32a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod/ bsam rten rnams la mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la myi spyod/ mthar kyis gan pi'i
32a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la mi spyod/ mdo na par shes pa rnams la mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod gzungs kyi
32a5('bum): sgo rnams la mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma spyod/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi spyod/ byams pa chen po la mi spyod/ snying rje chen po la myi
32a6('bum): spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu la mi spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i bras bu la myi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mi
32a7('bum): spyod/ rang byang chub la mi spyod/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid la myi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang gang la spyod pa
32a8('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis mi thub pa ste/ bcom
32b1('bum): ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis mi gnon par mi nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
32b2('bum): ba'i zil gis mi gnon pa la gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni/ zil gis mi gnon pa ste/ bcom ldan 'dra
32b3('bum): de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can
32b4('bum): snyeng pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par mi'i lus thob par gyur date/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
32b5('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ 
32b6('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ston pa dang / 'chang bde nga rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par byed pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston par byed pa dang / 
32b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod pa ni/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag
32b8('bum): thams cad snga phyi myed par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu
33a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas// phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ 
33a2('bum): rab 'byor de de ji snyam sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bco ldan 'das kyis bka'
33a3('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / 
33a4('bum): rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la dbyed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// 
33a5('bum): rab 'byor de gal te stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems/ can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par mi lus thob par gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
33a6('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du zhugs la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba de
33a7('bum): yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phral lam/ gsol pa/ 
33a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
33b1('bum): gzhan la ston pa dang 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang rnam par 'byed pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
33b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams chas mang du 'phel mi// rab 'byor dgal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thas cang snga phyi myed
33b3('bum): par mi'i lus tho bar gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ 
33b4('bum): mi la zhig gis rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na/ ra
33b5('bum): 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa com ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mngangong / btso ldan
33b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor da de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang
33b7('bum): 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du
33b8('bum): 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thos cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur to// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
34a1('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas te/ 
34a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan
34a3('bum): 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang 'chad pa dang / 
34a4('bum): rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang rnam pa da'abyed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ 
34a5('bum): de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor nga galade 'dzidu gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ste phyi mying ba mye'o lus thob par gyur te/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
34a6('bum): la la zhig gis dge babacu'i las kyi sam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / nang myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs skyed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mangs
34a7('bum): sa pa snga la sa pa mas pa smras su tu pa nga / sul ng+gA sa dang pa tha dab pas seMs skyed
34a8('bum): bkang pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkong pa dang / blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba da yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
34b1('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rab 'byem sa ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mAM de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
34b2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'di la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel
34b3('bum): pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams
34b4('bum): cad snga phyi myed par myi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la/ rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gdan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshang myed
34b5('bum): pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / 
34b6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu la rab tu bkong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba 'bros bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubs
34b7('bum): rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ 
34b8('bum): gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma gang shes rab kyi pha sa tu phyind pa 'di gzhan lasan
35a1('bum): pa dang 'chang pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor/ 
35a2('bum): g.ye sdong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi myed par mi'i lus thob par gyurang la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod
35a3('bum): zadang / bsam gtan bzhis rab tu bkod pa dang / chang myang ba bzhi la rab tu bkad pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bgang pa dang / mngon par rnas pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs/ 
35a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu
35a5('bum): bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu ba kod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ dag pa'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed
35a6('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar shegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas/ 
35a7('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel ba dang rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa
35a8('bum): dzadzi yang dag par spor na/ de'i bsang nams ches yang du 'brel lo// rab 'byor dag sa de stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed de dag thams cadasu phyi myed par phyi'i sus thab par gyur sa/ 
35b1('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mo gang la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa/ 
35b2('bum): 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkang
35b3('bum): pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su/ 
35b4('bum): bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i ba sod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
35b5('bum): pa rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi/ pha rold tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang rnam pa// gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'gel pa dang rnam par 'byed pa/ 
35b6('bum): dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston na de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor de gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte na gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi
35b7('bum): myed par mi'i lus thob par gyur pa la/ de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rab tu
35b8('bum): bkod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu la rab
36a1('bum): tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba/ 
36a2('bum): de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pabacom ldan 'das mdo
36a3('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu
36a4('bum): gzhog pa dang 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byedad pa dang / yang dag par ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phe dal lo// rab 'byor de de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
36a5('bum): po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par 'byed pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnasu 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dag
36a6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rtogs par byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can gang yang myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
36a7('bum): ngag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub te/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad bsad par gyur pa dang 'dra ste/ de dag \u0f7fsnying / 
36a8('bum): rje chen po thob bo// de dag rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pas dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub bo// de dag mtshan ma de dag lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ 
36b1('bum): de dag btang snyoms chen po thob po// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol pa tu phyin
36b2('bum): pa ni snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smo'o/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// bsam rgan gyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa ni snang ba'o// shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyind pa ni snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa
36b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir mi ldog go// de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
36b4('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par spyod pa'i phyir su'i go sa dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal tsa dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo bya da la yongs su rtong pa'i spyod pa dang / sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur
36b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yi na no// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod nams la yongs su spyad par 'dod
36b6('bum): pa dang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi lam ston par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen pos 'byung bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi btson ran gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su 'grol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can
36b7('bum): thams cad kyi bla na myed pa'i shes rab kyi myig bskyed par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas par bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ste/ 
36b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par myi spyod na yang des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go skabs myi 'byed ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
37a1('bum): 6/ nyid kyis nyin mtshan du myi gtong zhing brtson par gnas par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper nad sngon mang nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la/ dadus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po ched rnyed par 'gyur
37a2('bum): te/ des nor bu rin po che rnyed pas dga' ba dang / spro ba dang yid la bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las des nor buni po che de rnyed ma thag du sbyor bar gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang yid myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ 
37a3('bum): rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par kyi hung bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che dang bral bar gyur to// zhes nor bu rin po cher dang ldan pa sha stag rgyun tu 'byung ngo // rab 'byorade de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos 'dri ni
37a4('bum): rin po che snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa nga'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar myi bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba mang po dang / 
37a5('bum): ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyi ba de dag/ thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyi ba thos ca kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
37a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba la ni byang chub sems dpa' myi dmyigs na/ yid la bgyi ba myi dmyigs/ rnam pa tha mkhyen pa nyid mi dmyigaso// 
37a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas
37a8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ma mdzad do// chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
37b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni
37b2('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de la 'phel ba myed do// yongs su 'grib pa myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ 
37b3('bum): rang bzhin gyis dben zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'byung zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
37b4('bum): po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub so / sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
37b5('bum): yang dag par 'byung yang 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed de/ deb zhin nyid la yongs su 'grib pa myed do// chos kyi dbyings la 'phel pa 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'phel ba'i
37b6('bum): yongs su 'grib pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/ gnyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
37b7('bum): myi 'dzum mi 'gong mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rogang
37b8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// / bam po bzhi pa'o// 
38a1('bum): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa dang snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes
38a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
38a3('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmyigs su mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shes
38a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'ad des ci lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'ang/ 
38a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ gsol pa bcom ldan/ 'das ci lags/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma
38a6('bum): yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 
38a7('bum): 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
38a8('bum): ngamabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags myig shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
38b1('bum): rna ba shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sna shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
38b2('bum): ci lags lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor
38b3('bum): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sgra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom lda tshan 'das ci lags dri shes
38b4('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ro shengs rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'dra
38b5('bum): chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis ga sold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mig gi rnam par shes pa
38b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
38b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lce rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ 
38b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid gi rnam par shes pa shes bki pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das ci lags
39a1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
39a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lus kyi
39a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
39a4('bum): rab 'byor de ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni lags/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rna ba'i
39a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci/ lags sna'i dus te// reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam
39a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom lde na 'das ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes
39a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das cigs yid gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
39a8('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byord kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chu'i khams shes rab kyi
39b1('bum): pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mye'i khams shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rlung gi khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
39b2('bum): ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags nan mkha'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs rnam par shes pa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ 
39b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni me yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
39b4('bum): 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam// boH/ ldan 'das ci lags rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyim pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mying dang gzugs shes
39b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags skye mched drug shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la
39b6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci logs tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sred pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags len pa
39b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags srid pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags skye ba zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam
39b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags rga shi shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'byor ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
40a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dme/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
40a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ni lags bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin
40a3('bum): pa shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor den
40a4('bum): rmam yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra/ ci lags nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyi stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
40a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyi nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
40a6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chen po stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags don dam pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
40a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyong ngam/ bcom
40a8('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ 
40b1('bum): bco ldan 'das ci lags/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'ad ci
40b2('bum): lags chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
40b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ngo bo nyid stong
40b4('bum): pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
40b5('bum): de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad/ nas ci lags dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yang dag par
40b6('bum): spong ba bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
40b7('bum): dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags stobs lnga shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
40b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
41a1('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags bsam rnan
41a2('bum): bzhi shes rab kyi pha rarol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshad myed pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci logs gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
41a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par thar pa brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu
41a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom lAn/ 
41a5('bum): 'dabs ci lags mngon par shes pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ting nge 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
41a6('bum): ci lags gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
41a7('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags snying rje chen po shes
41a8('bum): rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyinang pa la spyong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu
41b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyir mi 'ong ba'i bras bu shes rab kyi pha
41b2('bum): rolangal tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dgra bcom pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rang byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ 
41b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
41b4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mir+tha/ 
41b5('bum): pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma/ yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gis
41b6('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam bcom ldan 'das ci lags tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gis pa nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin
41b7('bum): nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyi dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
41b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyi dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyi dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang yang ngas
42a1('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod
42a2('bum): dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'du byed gi stong pa nyid dang gsog nyi dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
42a3('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyi dang / yang dag pa'i batha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ ci lag kyi rnam par shes pa'i
42a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyi dang / rag lus pa nyi dad dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang
42a5('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ma tha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de ni
42a6('bum): ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ myig gi stong pa nyi dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
42a7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chas nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyi dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
42a8('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rna ba stong pa nyidang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus po nyid dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de ban
42b1('bum): nyid dang/ chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dom/ bcom ldan 'das
42b2('bum): ci lagasasna'i stong pa nyid dang gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / 
42b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyi dang / chos kyi gnas nyi dang // chos skyon myed pa nyid / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs lce'i stong pa
42b4('bum): nyid dang / spos nyid dang gsob nyid nga/ rig lus pa nyid dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzha na ma yin pa de bzhin nyi dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi/ 
42b5('bum): gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi stong pa nyid dang gsog nyid/ 
42b6('bum): gsapa nyid dang / rag lus pa nyi dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyidang / de bzhin nying dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos
42b7('bum): skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags yid gi stong pa nyidang / gsog nyid dang gnyis pa nyid dang / 
42b8('bum): ga lus pa nyid dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / da bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
43a1('bum): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lag
43a2('bum): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyi dang gsob nyi dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings
43a3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sgra stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang
43a4('bum): gsopa nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying pa ma mchis pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhi na nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid
43a5('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyi dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gri myi khyab pa'i dbyi ngas de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dri'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / 
43a6('bum): gsob nyi dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snyim po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyi dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyi dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon
43a7('bum): myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings te shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ro'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang
43a8('bum): rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyi dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / 
43b1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags reg gi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsopa nyid dang / rag las pa nyid dang / 
43b2('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyi dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyi dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyi dang chos kyi dbyings nyi dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
43b3('bum): bsam gis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chos kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag las pa nyid dang snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang
43b4('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyi dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab
43b5('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags myig gi
43b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyi dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyi dadang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
43b7('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan

47b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci la gas sred pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid
47b6('bum): dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dong / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de zhes
47b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags len pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / 
47b8('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha ro mang du phyin pa la spyod/ 
48a1('bum): gdas/ bcom ldan das ci lags srid pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsaganyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhi
48a2('bum): ting dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chas kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom
48a3('bum): ldan 'das ci lags skye ba'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gso pa nyid dang / rag lus pa nying dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nying dang mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa dbazhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang
48a4('bum): 'i skyeng ba shA / a gnas dang / chom sbyin meng / cid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsas gas mi ba pa'o des rab kyi pa'i mang du phyin pa la sno pa/ mam ldan sa
48a5('bum): rga zhi'i stong pa nyid dang / masog nyid dang gas pa nyid dang / rag sus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma no bya ba de bzhin nyidang/ gnan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang
48a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum
48a7('bum): za/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa/ 
48a8('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam/ 
48b1('bum): gis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma
48b2('bum): ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /

48b6('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos

48b8('bum): gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang chos kyi/

52b1('bum): ci lags 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsol nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nying /

52b3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang /
