52b5('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag la sa pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / 
52b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs myed
52b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying pa ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / 
52b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das rnang gis na
53a1('bum): sum pa/ ma ldanan// rab 'byu kyis gsal pa bcom ldan sa kyi lags/ rnam par ba ba brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gcig nyid dang gam pa nyid dang / gsus
53a2('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nur pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
53a3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid dang gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag las pa dri
53a4('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
53a5('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i stong pa
53a6('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag las pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
53a7('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi phyi rold tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i
53a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings
53b1('bum): nyid dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos sbyin myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa/ 
53b2('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
53b3('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa
53b4('bum): nyid dang gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag las pa nyid dang / snying po mam dachis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
53b5('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mthar dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags de bzhin gshes
53b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
53b7('bum): chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
53b8('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsams gis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das
53b9('bum): chos senas nyid ro snron med pa nyi dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bas gri mi khyaba'i dbyings dashwe rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ tso ldan 'dra ci lag pi 'jig bzhi'i stong pa nyid
54a1('bum): gci lags so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gso ba nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
54a2('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci
54a3('bum): lags byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gso bo nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyi dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
54a4('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos sgro rkyen myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gis mi khA ba pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
54a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang // de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan mo yin pa de
54a6('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi
54a7('bum): rabang tu phyin pa la snang ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dzas pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsopa nyid dang / rag sus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
54a8('bum): di bzhin cing dang / mi nang pa bzhi nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin ci dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / nam kyi gnas shing dang / chos kyi sbyin byed pa nyid nga/ yang dag pa'i mtha nga / 
54b1('bum): pa 'byor de ni ma yin// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ coM ldan 'das kyi
54b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang rag
54b3('bum): lus pa nyid dang / snying po mi mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa
54b4('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lani cig phyir 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang gsob
54b5('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhi ngan nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyi dra dang / chos nyid dang chas kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / 
54b6('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi kha pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid
54b7('bum): dang / gsog nyid dang gsopa nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor po bzhin nyid dang / ga na ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / 
54b8('bum): dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dgra bcom
54b9('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang mnor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / 
55a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
55a2('bum): rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gso/ ga nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings
55a3('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa
55a4('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gan
55a5('bum): nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gi sa myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
55a6('bum): nyadang nga / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi
55a7('bum): gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ni ma yin no// 
55a8('bum): rab 'byor kyis gsoyong pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag tu zhes rab kyi pa mang du byind pa la mi spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lar zhes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa gas
55b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dede ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha col tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan
55b2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ka la spyod pa de lta bur khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das don
55b3('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis mthong ba'i chos de dmyigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
55b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ grong dmyigs su mye/ dad pa de skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol dpe bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa
55b5('bum): rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skyes ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
55b6('bum): kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor de 'di ni stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sa ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhe las bya ste/ 
55b7('bum): lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa/ de ltar rtsol te de ltar 'bad pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ ye shes chen po rnam thams cad
55b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / des myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni
56a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams
56a2('bum): cid kyi myi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ni
56a3('bum): ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gal te skye ba yang ma lags/ myi skye ba yang ma lags/ pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
56a4('bum): bstan tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de/ ni ma yin no// gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba yang nadalags/ mi skye ba yang ma lags pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
56a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
56a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis rjes su mthong ngam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstam
56a7('bum): par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par
56a8('bum): 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mi skye dmyigs pa'i byang chub
56b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'dis ni mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi semaso
56b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad myed pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de shes
56b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par myi rtog pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag ni chu brgya pa las// le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// 
56b4('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ shin tu dben
56b5('bum): pa'i slad du zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyi nang pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du lnga dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slang du
56b6('bum): rdzogs par dga' bar/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slang du bdag pa'i
56b7('bum): spyong yul ma lags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa ni dben pa'i slad du zhi ba 'phra ba zhib bam// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slang du mkhas zhing / 
57a1('bum): rig pas rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la nan tan byed cing / 
57a2('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// bcom ldan 'dra
57a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du
57a4('bum): nan tan byed cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma dngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las/ byung ba'i chos gzhan gi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma
57a5('bum): dang ldan pa yang ma yin no// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyurapa/ 
57a6('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
57a7('bum): tu phyinang pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing kun nub par byed par gyur te/ bzung zhing bcangs te/ klag cing kun nub par byas nas kyang de bzhin du nan dan byed na/ ke'u shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ 
57a8('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro na/ bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar myi
57b1('bum): shAr bye ba brgya phrag slong gi char yang nye bar gyi 'gror/ khye ga khrag khrig brgya phyug stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gra'o// grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang rgyur yang myi bzod de// de nas dge slong gcin
57b2('bum): gcig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / ldan pa bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs
57b3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis
57b4('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
57b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa de dag gis zil kyis gnon no// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad
57b6('bum): ces smras so// dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ 
57b7('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis gnon na/ gang shes rab kyi
57b8('bum): pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin
58a1('bum): nyid du nan tan byed pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa pa/ 
58a2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sa rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / 
58a3('bum): dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang bral ba de
58a4('bum): ngag kyang zil gis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi dand pa la spyod pa yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa thabs
58a5('bum): mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dang bral ba dang gzil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pharo// lang tu phyind pa la spyod par ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
58a6('bum): dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/ gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gis gnon cing 'gro
58a7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 
58a8('bum): thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang bral ba/ gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems sa
58b1('bum): dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam rten gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis/ 
58b2('bum): gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu
58b3('bum): phyin pa ci skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan par dumi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
58b4('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ji skad du bstan pa dang / mthun da par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du
58b5('bum): gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhi na gshegs pa'i drung du myi 'byed de// de ltar bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub las 'phang bar
58b6('bum): mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
58b7('bum): bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag
58b8('bum): kyang 'gro bar sems te/ nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po myur du spobs shig/ skyes bu chen po sbyin par slobs shig/ lhung zed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyi snying po byang chub du 'dug ste/ bla na mye
59a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ blang bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o// zhes zer zhing ston/ 
59a2('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dong bar sems so// de'i drung du bdag / 
59a3('bum): kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'tshe ma yang 'tshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang cig tu 'gro bar sems so// lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams
59a4('bum): dang yang lhan cig du 'gro bar soms so// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar sem ston da lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang
59a5('bum): lhan cig 'gro bar sems so// tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po ya tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'gro bar sems so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar dong bar sems so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
59a6('bum): kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nyo bar 'dong bar sems so/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// shin tu mthong
59a7('bum): ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// gnas rtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
59a8('bum): lo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
59b1('bum): zab mo 'di la de ltar spyad pa'i de'i lus ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnon par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la myi 'byung myi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni
59b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ myig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nang dam
59b3('bum): lce'i nad ngam lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod
59b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin/ 
59b5('bum): pa'i yon tan legs par brjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus stond snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi rtog pa yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su
59b6('bum): shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa ni sangs rgyas
59b7('bum): kyi mthur rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang po rgyu byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di snyom/ 
59b8('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so// dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
60a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phar lang tu phyind pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen
60a2('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / 
60a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs/ 
60a4('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i
60a5('bum): tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to// 
60a6('bum): can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa des sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur
60a7('bum): ba dang / mar mod pa srung gtong zhi 'jigs pa skyed do// denas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// com ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
60a8('bum): che pa thams cad kyi drung du sdig gi kyi lo ma rgyagyi bar 'gyur yi/ btsum ldan las kyis pan yul pa// dag de byang chub thams dpa'i sems pa' dzi pa thams pad kyi drung du chung
60b1('bum): do can rtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis
60b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can rtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
60b3('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can rtsibs nye bar 'ong ngo / 
60b4('bum): dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes nyen dang dbral na/ des dge ba'i bla shes gnyen mi mthong bas shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi mtho / thos so// ma thos pas
60b5('bum): myi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ji ltar sgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan dan mi byed do// dga' dro byang chub sems dpa' de yang bsdig to can gyis glags rnyed par
60b6('bum): 'gyur ro// dga' bo yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' bdud cig
60b7('bum): can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa ba la bsngags pa brjod na// de la bdud sdig gi
60b8('bum): can 'di snyam du sems/ gang ma yin pa'i chos bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi sreg yin te/ gang dam pa'i tshis ma yin pa'i sngags pa smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang ba'i nang nas bdag gi gran/ 
61a1('bum): 9/ su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis som/ gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni de bdag gis bsam pa yongs/ 
61a2('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam sde/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis klags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu la bdud sdig to can gyis glags
61a3('bum): rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shin tu shes rab kyi pha rolud tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
61a4('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang ba/ zung ba dang / klags pa dang kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya// ngas dang de'i rting ma rnyed na khyod kyis lnga snyed re skan zhes zer na
61a5('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig can gi sa klags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan gang gi tshe/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyam
61a6('bum): pa bskyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'o// da ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad po/ 
61a7('bum): nga ni bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o// nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
61a8('bum): spyong pa ma yin no// khyod ni bzod pa'i pha yang tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bsam gdan gyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin/ 
61b1('bum): na/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// zhes rlom sems byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi// 
61b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/ dga' bo de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang spro ba dang / nyams bde ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// 
61b3('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i mying brjod dam/ rus brjod dam/ kun tu grags par 'gyur na/ 
61b4('bum): de mying brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag ste/ dra gzhan la smod la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
61b5('bum): chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mar bya ba'i yon / tan de dag kyang de la myed par rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan ma myed pa// de dag gis nyon mongs pa skyed cing / bdag sdod gzhan la smod de
61b6('bum): 'di skad du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sem sa dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i
61b7('bum): rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo // zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa la de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing / smod na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs
61b8('bum): byar mi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byil song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung dungu
62a1('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gi rlob ste/ de'i tshig bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par bya bas sems te/ de la de dag gis thos
62a2('bum): sam mthong na mthun par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing / de bzhin du slob te/ de dag de bzhin du slob pa'i tshe/ de bzhin du slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin
62a3('bum): tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de dag bsam pa phyi nad ci log tu 'gyur bas/ lus drang ngag dang yid gi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ 
62a4('bum): de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang yi dgas kyi/ yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud gi las kyang shim
62a5('bum): tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong bas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang spro dang / tshim pa dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
62a6('bum): theg pa po'i gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang brtsod cing / nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gis khyod ni ma yin no// zhes zer na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
62a7('bum): nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thab mo dang brtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang 'chang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
62a8('bum): kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/ de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/ de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin no// snyam du/ 
62b1('bum): sems par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gzhan du 'thab cing brtsod la 'khrug cing 'chang 'bru na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam
62b2('bum): dusems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta/ 
62b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang bsams pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las brtsamaso// 
62b4('bum): zhes nas dga' spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sem sa dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod
62b5('bum): la 'khrug cing 'tshang 'bru na/ gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid/ yongs su mi bdang zhe na/ ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems skyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing brtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing 'tshang 'bru bar
62b6('bum): gyur pa de srid kyi skal bar go cha bgo bar bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam 'on te/ ma lags kyis skal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal
62b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la/ ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos
62b8('bum): bstan te/ dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag 'thab cing brtsod pa dang / gage zhing myi snyan par brjod pa byas nas phyir myi 'chags par 'dud par dzi
63a1('bum): cing khon du bzung ste/ gnas na/ dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar mi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu mi btang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar skal pa de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o// 
63a2('bum): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs cing brtso dade/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang 'dud par mi 'dzin la/ phyin cad sdom par 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nye bar thob ste
63a3('bum): bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smra ba la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par 'gyur bar bya dgos na/ de ltar bdag la gzhan mi snyan par smra zhing
63a4('bum): phyir bzlog pa ni mi tshul gis de ltar mi bya'i/ bdag gis glen pa 'am lbu gas pa bzhin du bya'o// bas dag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa myed pa ra bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par
63a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya bar dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan semasu byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyi bdag
63a6('bum): gis de dag la gnod sems myi bya'o// bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yo da par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lnga zhing
63a7('bum): glags tshal bras glags mi rnyed do// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang / 'grogs par mi bya'o// de dag dang lhan cig gnas par myi bya'o// 'dug par myi
63a8('bum): bya'o// gam 'dug na yang dmu la yang gnod semasu myi bya'o// 'jug par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug pa bya ba 'di ni bdag la mi nul la// de ci'i phyir zhes
63b1('bum): 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar bya ba dag go// snyam mo// dga' bos gsol pa/ 
63b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ ston pa dang / 
63b3('bum): ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs te/ gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o// 'dis ji lta
63b4('bum): bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang
63b5('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 
63b6('bum): ngo ngam pa stong pa nyid du/ 'dus byas stong bzhi dang / 'dus ma byas gleng pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa snang ba nyi dang / theg sa dang thas skyed po stong bani dang / de ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin spong bas
63b7('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa
63b8('bum): nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
64a1('bum): bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i/ 
64a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang // ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang // gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
64a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
64a4('bum): nyid gang la bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed do// des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste/ gal te de dris par spyod cing / 
64a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ldan par gyur na/ de la bdag gis bslab par myi bya ba'i// gal de byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
64a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni srab pa mnyam pa yin no// 
64a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcurtsa bdun pa'o// / bam po// 
64a8('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ses
64b1('bum): dba' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid // rab 'byur gyi stong
64b2('bum): nyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub
64b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de ni dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
64b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa
64b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rabya 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor nga thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
64b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byorang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor rang
64b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor
64b8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byorang mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byin
65a1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid
65a2('bum): ngo/ rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ngo // 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis
65a3('bum): sdong ngo // 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ngo // rnaM bI nI rnam par shes pas stong ngo // myig ni myig gis stong ngo // rna ba ni rna bas stong ngo / sna ni snas stong ngo // lce ni lces stong ngo / lus ni lus gis stong ngo // yid ni yid kyi
65a4('bum): stong ngo // gzugs ni gzugasmra stong ngo // sgra ni sgras stong ngo // dri ni dadris stong ngo // ro ni ros stong ngo // reg ni reg gis stong ngo // chos ni tshes kyis stong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes
65a5('bum): pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // lce'i rna ma par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par
65a6('bum): shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // yid gi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // rna ba'i dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te
65a7('bum): len pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / 
65a8('bum): yidang gi 'dus te reg pa ni yid gi 'dus te reg depas stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i dus
65b1('bum): rig pa'i rgyan kyim tshor bas stong ngo // sna'i lus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas spong ngo // sde'i dus ni rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshod bani lce'i dus ti ga pa'irgyan byas tsha bas stong/ 
65b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo / yid gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // sa'i khams ni sa'i
65b3('bum): kyis stong ngo / chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ngo / me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis sdong ngo // na mkha'i khams ni na mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo / rnam par shes bi n+di rnam
65b4('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ngo // ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ngo po/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong ngo // 
65b5('bum): skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ngo // reg pa na rig pa stong de tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ngo // sred pa ni sred pa stong ngo // len pa ni len pas stong ngo // srid pa ni srid pas stong ngo // skye ba ni skye bas stong ngo // 
65b6('bum): rgo shi ni rga shes stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rolang du phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa ni bzod
65b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pastong ngo // bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // shes rab
65b8('bum): kyi pha romang tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 
66a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong / 
66a2('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma
66a3('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa
66a4('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa
66a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myeng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rjes
66a6('bum): ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams
66a7('bum): kyis stong ngo / stobs ni stobs rnams kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyas pas so// 
66a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo po// tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ngo // gzugs myed/ 
66b1('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs phye ra pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong / rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis sdong ngo // mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni
66b2('bum): mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
66b3('bum): las stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs
66b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong 'o/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis spong ngo // so so// yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod nga/ 
66b5('bum): snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a dris pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // 
66b6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub ni rang
66b7('bum): byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems
66b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gsolang pa/ 
67a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs pas par bgyi bI rA slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral
67a2('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du/ slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar
67a3('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi
67a4('bum): ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i
67a5('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags/ sam/ 'du shes pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'dod chag
67a6('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi nga du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
67a7('bum): 'du shes mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
67a8('bum): 'du byed bdod chags dang bral bar dgyi ba'i slad du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
67b1('bum): sam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgo ra pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa bas par gyi bu'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyeb nyid du slob pa lags sam
67b2('bum): rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi bu'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
67b3('bum): slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
67b4('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ra ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob dalags sam/ myig 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
67b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig myi skye ba rabagyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rnab bas par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ 
67b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i srang du
67b7('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du srab pa lags sam/ rna ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sngabs par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na
67b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob pa logs sam/ snga 'dod dgas dang bral bar 'gyi ba'i slang dus da na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du srab pa lags sam/ sA gag par bgyi ba'i ming du bla // 
68a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnamapa
68a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slod du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
68a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lce mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
68a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'do da chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad de mkhyen po nyid du slob pa lags sam// lus 'gag par
68a5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slo ba pa lags sam/ lus mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
68a6('bum): yi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du mi slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
68a7('bum): sam yid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
