74a7('bum): pha rol tu phyinid pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ni rnam pa
74a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha lang tu byanid pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chub khrims kyi pho ri lang tu phyin/ 
74b1('bum): babs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha ralod tu phyinid pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
74b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
74b3('bum): pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinid pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
74b4('bum): slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tha ma das cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ bzod pa'i pha rol
74b5('bum): tu phyinid pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol da tu phyinid pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
74b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
74b7('bum): pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
74b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin
75a1('bum): 5/ khabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gi pha rolod tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sgrub na rnam pa thams cang / 
75a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi
75a3('bum): skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
75a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i sgra dad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ 
75a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid
75a6('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du rnam slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
75a7('bum): nang stong ba nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sgrub ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrib pa lags sam/ 
75a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid bas par 'gyi ba'i slad du sgrib na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa gad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slab pa lags sam/ phye stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slong
75b1('bum): lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
75b2('bum): sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
75b3('bum): slob pa logs sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
75b4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyis ra ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa/ lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar
75b5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi bam slad du slo na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
75b6('bum): sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
75b7('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid burla bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
75b8('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
76a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
76a2('bum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// 
76a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid byas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
76a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi skye ba myed par
76a5('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bas par bgyi/ ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
76a6('bum): lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa la gas sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad
76a7('bum): du skyob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ mtha' las 'dra
76a8('bum): blo snying pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam brdzam
76b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar
76b2('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nges par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
76b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
76b4('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
76b5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba myi da pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
76b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi skye
76b7('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
76b8('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
77a1('bum): ga slob narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rang bzhini stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos tham
77a2('bum): cad stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos thams stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
77a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi
77a4('bum): skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsapar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
77a5('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di rjod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan
77a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad maskye
77a7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang
77a8('bum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa la
77b1('bum): sam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
77b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po
77b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
77b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bas dra bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags/ 
77b5('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ na pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gagapar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
77b6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
77b7('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
77b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i
78a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
78a2('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du
78a3('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi
78a4('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chag/ ngas dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thas
78a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni 'a/ gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi skye
78a6('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi pas b+har bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul
78a7('bum): gi rkang pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
78a8('bum): slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ dbang po lnga pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
78b1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams
78b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang po lnga myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad
78b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na
78b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
78b5('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chag sa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
78b6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun myi skye bar bgyi ba'i
78b7('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ 
78b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i
79a1('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
79a2('bum): sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
79a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i badren pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi
79a4('bum): skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ du slob pa lags sa/ bsam gtan bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i/ slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa log/ 
79a5('bum): sam/ bsam gtan ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam bsam gtan bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam
79a6('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi pas par bgyi ba'i
79a7('bum): slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
79a8('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
79b1('bum): lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
79b2('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam
79b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam sa
79b4('bum): thard pa brgyad pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thas
79b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar dag sde brgyad 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa
79b6('bum): brgyad myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad me khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar da gas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rna ba
79b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lag
79b8('bum): sam// mthad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad su khyen pa nyid du sgrub pa legs sam/ mtha kyis gnas pa gangos pam dzun
80a1('bum): pa dgu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa
80a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
80a3('bum): sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
80a4('bum): myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du tshul gis slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
80a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slo kha na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob na pa lcags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ 
80a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
80a7('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags
80a8('bum): sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
80b1('bum): slob pa lags sam/ gzungs gi sgo rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob
80b2('bum): narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs gi sgo rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs gi sgo
80b3('bum): rnams myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu byasra bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
80b4('bum): lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags da dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs
80b5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob
80b6('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi
80b7('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
80b8('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags so/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rna ba thos na mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lag+sas
81a1('bum): cags ma/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang / bral bar rgyu ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bani 'gag par 'an
81a2('bum): ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam
81a3('bum): snying rje chen po bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
81a4('bum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po myo skye bar bgyi ba'i
81a5('bum): slob du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slo ba pa lags sam / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams byas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
81a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgya sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dod pa chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
81a7('bum): lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
81a8('bum): rnams myi skye bar bgyi tha'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu byas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
81b1('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ rgyu nang du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi'i slongab du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'a/ 
81b2('bum): khar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bgyi bar slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa/ 
81b3('bum): lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu byas pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyiraro'ang ba'i 'bras bu 'ong ba'i
81b4('bum): 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob
81b5('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du smon rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
81b6('bum): lags sam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi bar
81b7('bum): smad du du slob na rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags som phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slobo na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob pa lags sam/ 
81b8('bum): phyir ro myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar brtsa ba'i srad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob lags sam// dge bcom pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
82a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bgyi
82a2('bum): ba'i srang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub pas par
82a3('bum): bgyi ba'i gling du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub 'dong chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
82a4('bum): rang byang chub 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tham/ nas cad mkhyen pa nyid slab pa lags sam/ rang byang chub miskye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
82a5('bum): slob pa lags sam/ lam gyirnam bzhes pa nyid bas pa bgyi ba'i slang du slongs/ rnam pa thams cad sa byan pa ni du slob pa lags sam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang chags dang / 
82a6('bum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam ge rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du rlob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sleb pa lags
82a7('bum): sam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
82a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad 'khyend pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du mi slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad
82b1('bum): byung pa shid ga par brgya 'i slang du slaban/ rnam pa thams ca ma byed pa nying du slob par 'gyur pa lags sapa/ rnam pa thams cadas byed pa nyid kyi skye bar bgyi ba'i spang du sra par/ rnam pa thams pa
82b2('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gnas gtan rab 'byor kyis gang 'di skad du/ gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir du slob na/ rnam pa
82b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'jo/ chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i
82b4('bum): phyir du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad sa byed pa nyid du slob pa yim nas/ tshor ba 'ding chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir du slebs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nas/ tshor ba 'gag par
82b5('bum): tshe phying du rlob na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir du slong ma/ rnam par thathams cad ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ 'dugs
83a1('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes 'dod chags dang bral bar bye ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
83a2('bum): 'du shes 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du shes myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed zad par bya/ 
83a3('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir nga slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
83a4('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 3/ byed mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes par shes pa zang par bya'i
83a5('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par
83a6('bum): shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// myig zad
83a7('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam po thams cadang mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob
83a8('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob nang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
83b1('bum): du slob ni nam/ ka ma skye brna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ 
83b2('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa 'dod
83b3('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'iphyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sA 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam pa kyi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
83b4('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam da ste zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mthun du nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sde 'dung chags dang bral bar bya ba'i/ 
83b5('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin no/ lce 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
83b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir smr-iN+Dan rnam pa thams
83b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin no/ 
83b8('bum): yid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'gag par
84a1('bum): pa'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs zad par bya ba'i
84a2('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ni/ gzugs 'gag par bya/ 
84a3('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
84a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin namaHsgra 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sgra 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
84a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin na maM/ sgra myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yi na nam/ dri zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
84a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri 'tshedad chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
84a7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dri myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
84a8('bum): ro 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin nam/ ro 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ro myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
84b1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin/ 
84b2('bum): nam/ reg 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg mi skye bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos zad par bya ba'i phyir
84b3('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thos
84b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slo ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// myig gi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
84b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la// dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cadamakhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes
84b6('bum): ma 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam
84b7('bum): par shes zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin
84b8('bum): nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyidadu
85a1('bum): slob pa lags sam/ A'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
85a2('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya bI phyir srob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar
85a3('bum): ba'i phyir du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zang par bya ba'i phyir skud du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
85a4('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir du slob na rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'a gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i
85a5('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myi skye bar zla ba'i phyi du slob pa na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa mi na nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zang par bya ba'i phyir slob ma
85a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/ sras kyi nam por shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ lus kyi rnam por zhes pa 'gas
85a7('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes
85a8('bum): ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin no// 
85b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyira'ang slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa/ 
85b2('bum): yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
85b3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar byar ba'i phyir slob pa na rnam pa thos
85b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin/ nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
85b5('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tha thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin// naM/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rna ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i
85b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na
85b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
85b8('bum): pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nama'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa/ 
86a1('bum): yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
86a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
86a3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'ag
86a4('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyi ra slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yi
86a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
86a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam/ 
86a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// myig gi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/ myig gi 'dus te reg
86a8('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na rnam pa
86b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i / 
86b2('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba zang par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dngapal bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
86b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i/ 
86b4('bum): tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i/ tshor ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
86b5('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
86b6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
86b7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zod par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod
86b8('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
87a1('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
87a2('bum): tshor ba zad pa'i bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
87a3('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar
87a4('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob da pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba/ zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
87a5('bum): pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
87a6('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
87a7('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// sa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa nyid du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thos/ 
87a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
87b1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
87b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chu'i khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
87b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ me'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mye'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
87b4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mye'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam mye'i khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
87b5('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams zad par bya ba'i phyir/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
87b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams 'gog par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa zas/ 
87b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin namaH/ nam mkha'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
87b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
88a1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes/ 
88a2('bum): pa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namarnam par shes pa'i khams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
88a3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// ma rig pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
88a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa/ nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mo rig pa 'gag par bya ba'i slob na
88a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ma ri/ ga pa myi skye bar bya bar 'i phyir srub na rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ nang pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir gron
88a6('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'di da chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na
88a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam par shes thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnaM
88a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir/ 
88b1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mying dang gzugs zad par bya ba/ 
88b2('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mying dang gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mying
88b3('bum): dang gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mying dang gzugs myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
88b4('bum): pa yin nam skye mched drug zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rna dam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched drug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
88b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched/ drug 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye mched drug myi skye bar bya 'i/ 
88b6('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i
88b7('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa 'grag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ reg pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sgom
88b8('bum): no rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor bzad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya 'o byo
89a1('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du skyob pa yin nam/ tshor ba 'gog par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshor ba myi skye bar/ 
89a2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sred pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sred pa 'dod chags da
89a3('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sred pa 'gog par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin pa yin nam/ slad
89a4('bum): pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ le nad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin ni
89a5('bum): lend po 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ le no// pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
89a6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ len pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sri nga ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
89a7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nas/ srid pa 'dod tshogs dang bral por bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ srid pa 'gag por bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad ma
89a8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ srid pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du rlo
89b1('bum): ba yin nam// skye ba 'dod chags bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba 'gag par bya ba'i slad du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
89b2('bum): dadu slob pa yin nam/ skye ba myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob/ 
89b3('bum): pa yin nam/ rga shi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
89b4('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin namasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na
89b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid du slob pa yini nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya/ ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
89b6('bum): pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bye ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir
89b7('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims/ 
89b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa/ 
90a1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
90a2('bum): pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa
90a3('bum): yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa ya ni nam/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
90a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
90a5('bum): phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
90a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa ya na nam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin
90a7('bum): pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
90a8('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar byar ba'i
90b1('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes
90b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'gag par par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
90b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid zad par
90b4('bum): bye ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang
90b5('bum): stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
90b6('bum): slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir srob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam phyi stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
90b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ phyi stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
90b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin na mo/ phyi nang stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir/ slob sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang dran
91a1('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi
91a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin no/ 
91a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
91a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams ca
91a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'dod cha/ gas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin namo/ chen po stong pa nyid 'ag/ 
91a6('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ don dam/ 
91a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
91a8('bum): pa yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
91b1('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zad pa'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na
91b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi skye bar
91b3('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du skyob pa yin nam/ 'dus
91b4('bum): mi byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas/ stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
91b5('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir
91b6('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha' las 'das
91b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin/ 
91b8('bum): nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
92a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong / 
92a2('bum): pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa
92a3('bum): nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor/ 
92a4('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad nga mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zad pa bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid padu slob pa yin/ 
92a5('bum): nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
92a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad mkhye stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
92a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyi
92a8('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir srob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ rang gi mtshan nying stong pa nyid zang par bya
92b1('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid
92b2('bum): stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi
92b3('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ 
92b4('bum): slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
92b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral
92b6('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa
92b7('bum): nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod
92b8('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid
93a1('bum): pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin/ 
93a2('bum): nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rje
93a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i
93a4('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du smos pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slab pa yin nam/ dran pa
93a5('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar go/ zhag pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
93a6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
93a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob
93a8('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar
93b1('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gri rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi myi
93b2('bum): skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral ba
93b3('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slo
93b4('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs da lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi dad du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i/ 
93b5('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin no/ stobs lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams ca mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs rnams myi skye bar
93b6('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun pad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag dung
93b7('bum): 'dod mags dang sprul bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ byang chub kyi yon lag bdun 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa min
93b8('bum): nam sa byang chub kyi yan log 'drod ni skye bar bya ba'i phyir slo ba na rlom pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'im sa ya sag brgya byud par byo ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad parkyen
94a1('bum): ga pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam
94a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
94a3('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
94a4('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags
94a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan zhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ 
94a6('bum): slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams
94a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slad du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thos
94a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
94b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad myed pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zang par
94b2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob
94b3('bum): pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi skye bar bya/ 
94b4('bum): ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yi na nam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob narnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par
94b5('bum): tha rad pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob narna ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa rgya yin nam/ rnam par tha rang pa brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa zhes
94b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu/ 
94b7('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye
94b8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bya bar ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
95a1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa zad par
95a2('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thos
95a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
95a4('bum): rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon dpa myed pa myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhye nud pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams zang
95a5('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyenod pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang / bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam par thos cad mkhyend pa nyid
95a6('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin namamangon par shes pa rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa
95a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'dod chags dang bral
95a8('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin / 
95b1('bum): rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
95b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
95b3('bum): panyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na ni
95b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshedags pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sgo kha na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
95b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
95b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs par bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin no// myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyi/ 
95b7('bum): slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'gog par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi skye bar bya ba
95b8('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig
96a1('bum): shAg pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
96a2('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po zad par bya 'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
96a3('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral por bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
96a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
96a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas/ kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya// ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin no/ 
96a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
96a7('bum): slob ma rnam pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nos/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob rnarnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugaso pa'i 'bras bu 'dong chog
96a8('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs
96b1('bum): pa'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob pa na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smod pa yin nam/ 
96b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad
96b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
96b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba de'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
96b5('bum): 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ni/ 
96b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin
96b7('bum): namaka dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
96b8('bum): rang byang chub zad par bya ba'i phyir slob ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam
97a1('bum): rang byang chub 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na d+hA TA ya rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub myi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
97a2('bum): slob pa yin nam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid thod par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gi rnam pa zhus pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam
97a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi skye bar bya ba'i
97a4('bum): phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thos
97a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa
97a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du slob pa yin nam zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no// 
97a7('bum): bam po/ rab 'byor da de ci snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag/

97b1('bum): byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// myig gi de

97b3('bum): ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de med pa 'am spang ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba'am skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyu

97b6('bum): de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad par 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am/ 
97b7('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ram/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am/
