125b2('bum): po myed pa la spyod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni snying po myed pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni snying po myed pa'o/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi/ 
125b3('bum): pa ni snying po med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni snying po myed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyind pa ni snying po myod pa'o// nang stong po nyid ni snying pa myed
125b4('bum): pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o// 
125b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong / pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o// mtha' las 'odas pa stong pa nyid ni snying po myong ba'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong ba nyid ni snying po/ 
125b6('bum): myed pa'o// do ba myed pa stong pa 'di ni snying po myed pa'o// rang bani dz+nyAn stong pa nyid ni stong po myed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni snying po mod pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'i
125b7('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong bya nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// dran pa nya
125b8('bum): gzhog pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// yang dag par spro/ ba rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni snying po myod pa'o// dbang po rnams ni snying po med pa'o// stobs rna ngasu ni snying po myed pa'o// 
126a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snying po med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o// bsam gton
126a2('bum): rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// mthar
126a3('bum): kyis gra nas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ni snying po myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rjes
126a4('bum): nA snying po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// dgazungs kyi sgo rnams ni snying po myed pa'o/ de bzhin ga dgas pa'i stobs rnams ni snying po myed phra'o// 
126a5('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ so so yang dag/ par rig pa rnams ni snying po myed pa'o// snying rje chen po ni snying po myed pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ 
126a6('bum): bco brgyad ni snying po myed pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni snying po myed pa'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
126a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa sa ni snying po nyid kyang myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na snying po la dmyigs pa lta ga la yod/ de nas 'dod
126a8('bum): pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu shi nod tu mang ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
126b1('bum): tu sems bskyed pa dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ji skad du bstun pa 'di la spyod pa dang / don 'di la spyod kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas/ nyan thos kyi/ 
126b2('bum): sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur to/ yang dag pa'i mngon du myi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya ba'i gnas so// rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
126b3('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid 'di mngon par myi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa'i ses/ 
126b4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag ni chos kyi mnyam pa nyid gang mngon du byas pa sa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ra 'gyur ba de mngon du mi bya bya de ni myi dkra'i/ lha'i bu
126b5('bum): dag sems can tshad myed grangs med dpag tu myed pa thams cad/ yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes go cha bgos la/ grang yang mo ngas su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba'i sems can de dag / 
126b6('bum): shin tu myi dmyigs pa ni de dag la de bas dka' ba ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar bye'i zhes bla na myeng pa yang dag
126b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/ gang sems can 'dul bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' 'dul bar sems pa dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' dben pa'i
126b8('bum): phyir sems can dben par lta'o// nam mkha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can stong pa nyid du lta'o// nam mkha' snying po myed pa nyid kyi phyir sems can snying po myed pa nyid du lta'o// nam mkha'
127a1('bum): gcog gi phyir sems can sno rgyun / Sh+ku mu mas pas des byang rgyu rnams pa sa sa phyin pa gang de su skyed du sa kyi spyod skor spyod pa smra
127a2('bum): byed pa ste/ gang sems can rnams kyi don tu gocha gyen pa de dag ni nam mkha' dang brtsod par 'dod bu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go je de yang bkri stsa la// sems camago don
127a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa'i phyir go cha dben par lta'o// gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe// 
127a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par myi 'gyur/ na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
127a5('bum): gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par ba'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir sems can dben po'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems
127a6('bum): can dben pa'o// rno bar shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myig dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rna ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sna dben po'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
127a7('bum): lce dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lus dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sgra dben pa'i phyir
127a8('bum): sems can dben pa'o// dri dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// ro dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// reg dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// chos dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
127b1('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
127b2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
127b3('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg
127b4('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pe dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg
127b5('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba deban pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben po'i phyir se/ mas can dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshu
127b6('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa
127b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mye'i khams deban
127b8('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
128a1('bum): ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems
128a2('bum): can dben pa'o// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sred pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
128a3('bum): lend pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben po'o// skye ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rga shi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol
128a4('bum): tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// ba zod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
128a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
128a6('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// phyi stod pa nyid pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ses
128a7('bum): can dben pa'i// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben po'o// chen po stong pa nyid dben po'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'dus byas
128a8('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// thog ma
128b1('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// chos thams
128b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dngos po myed
128b3('bum): pastong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dran pa nyos
128b4('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yang // dag par spong ba bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
128b5('bum): dbang po lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// stobs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// byang chub kyi yan la gi bdun dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i
128b6('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// bsam gtan pa ni dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshad myed pa bani
128b7('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dben pa'i byor sems can dben pa'o// mthar kyis
128b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smand pa med pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mngon par the/ 
129a1('bum): pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
129a2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// byams pa chen
129a3('bum): bo dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs/ 
129a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lan do cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa/ 'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can des
129a5('bum): ma'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dbenapa'o// rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// 
129a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// shes rab 'am po / gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro mang du phyin pa dben pa'o// 
129a7('bum): tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// 'du shes dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 
129a8('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dben pa'o// myig dpon pa'i phyi shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyinang pa dben pa'o// rna ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ben pa// 
129b1('bum): sna dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// yid
129b2('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// sgra dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 
129b3('bum): de dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// ro dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// reg dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// chos
129b4('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ 
129b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ dben pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
129b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa ni dben pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// yid kyi rna ma par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
129b7('bum): dben pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg
129b8('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dben pa'o// lho'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
130a1('bum): rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes/ 
130a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ 
130a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab
130a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// su'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyin/ 
130a5('bum): pa dbyen+ya pa'o// chu'i khams dben po phyir shes rab kyi pa'o/ lad tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mye'i khams dben pa'i phyir na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dben pa'o// rlung gi khams dben
130a6('bum): 'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dben pa'o// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro myang tu phyir
130a7('bum): da byen pa'o// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin/ 
130a8('bum): pa dben pa'o// mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
130b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// sred pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// len pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
130b2('bum): rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// skye ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rga shi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
130b3('bum): tI phyi nad pa dben pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinod pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind po dben pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa dper pag
130b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nod pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// byasam
130b5('bum): ko gtan gri pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 
130b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa dben pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dben pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes
130b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
130b8('bum): dben pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben parjo/ 
130b9('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad dben pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o/ 
131a1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa
131a2('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab
131a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// 
131a4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dpe na pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// yang dag
131a5('bum): par spong ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa/ dben pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dbang po bden pa'i phyir shes
131a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa dben pa'o// stabs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa dben pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// ba'igs
131a7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan dben pa'i
131a8('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa dben pa'o// tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dben pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131b1('bum): phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o/ 
131b2('bum): rnam par tha'adas pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smond pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
131b3('bum): pa dben pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
131b4('bum): stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dbyen
131b5('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang/ ba dben pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dpon
131b6('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa dben pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir
131b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dbe/ 
131b8('bum): pa'o// rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
132a1('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben pa'o// lha'i bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dben par bshad pa la sems myi 'dzum yongs
132a2('bum): zhum par myi 'gyur la/ de'i yid 'jigs par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord
132a3('bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor da ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams
132a4('bum): ca ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rgyang chos thams cad dben pa dang / zhi ba dang ma skyes pa'i
132a5('bum): slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la zhum par mi 'gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'o// des de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
132a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la zhum par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur/ ba dang / gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang la zhum par 'gyur
132a7('bum): bre'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshad pa la myi zhum myi 'gong zhing / tshig tshang
132a8('bum): de spyod lug par myi 'gyur la/ myi 'dzegs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa lpags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur
132b1('bum): ba'am/ gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'ichos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po/ 
132b2('bum): dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga
132b3('bum): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de ni dbang po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang phyag bya bar yang ma zad de gang 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa'i
132b4('bum): rog dang ldan pa/ dge rgyas dang 'bras bu che ba dang gnas gtsang dma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la phyag rgya
132b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas grangs myed tshad myed pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe
132b6('bum): skyong ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i dgongs pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa de ni sbyin/ 
132b7('bum): pa'i phyi rolang du phyind pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi bu rosod du phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bzod par pha rol du phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// brjod bgrus kyi pa ro mang du po nga/ 
132b8('bum): pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
133a1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
133a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par
133a3('bum): byed pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog smra pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog smra pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
133a4('bum): ba'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// myi dmyig sa pa stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yongs su rdzog
133a5('bum): par byed pa'o/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par/ byed pa'o// ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa/ zer byed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
133a6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
133a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi yongs rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
133a8('bum): pur byed pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su
133b1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
133b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// snying rje chen po yongs su
133b3('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyir myo'adzi
133b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dgra bcom pa yang dag las nyid ye/ dngas su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
133b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// zhes dgongs pa mdzad de// rab 'byor dade byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gang la sangs
133b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar zhugs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byorar gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
133b7('bum): sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdang sdig to can mngon par spruld pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar chad bya bar mi nus so// rab 'byor de chos gnyis dang ldan
133b8('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na des chos thams cad stong pa'o// zhes bya bar rnam par ltos pa yin/ des sems can thams cad
134a1('bum): kyang yongs su ma btang ba yin te/ rab 'byor chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab/ 
134a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin/ sangs
134a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad do// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis myi thub pa yin/ 
134a4('bum): no// rab 'byor de de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du ni lha'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems so// bsnyen bkur ba dang / yongs su 'dri ba dang kun dri ba yang byed par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod
134a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du thob par/ 'gyur gis de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par spyod pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas
134a6('bum): rnam par spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyod par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir ni na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can 'ogon myed pa rnams kyi 'gon du 'gyur ro// sems
134a7('bum): can skyabs myed pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro// sems can dpung gnyen myed pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro// sems can gnas myed pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can rten myed pa rnams kyi sems can
134a8('bum): rten du 'gyur ro// sems can gling myed pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro// sems can mun par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes de la spro ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
134b1('bum): tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig dge slong gi dge 'dun gis yongs su bskor te bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
134b2('bum): po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i mying dang ris yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos
134b3('bum): ston cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nga da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ched
134b4('bum): du brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phu da kyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
134b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i zham 'bring na cha/ ngas pa'i spyad pa spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag gi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
134b6('bum): cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa bzhin no// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rngo snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
134b7('bum): gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
134b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad spyod pa cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma
135a1('bum): bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag
135a2('bum): kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar mdzad pa de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched
135a3('bum): du brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad spyod cing
135a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs kyi mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
135a5('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa/ 'i sprad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la/ 
135a6('bum): spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang
135a7('bum): de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa
135a8('bum): mdzad de// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad
135b1('bum): pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
135b2('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te ched du
135b3('bum): brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang chos stond pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad/ 
135b4('bum): pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rje
135b5('bum): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar de dag la spro ba mdza/ 
135b6('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos ston te tshod du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po skyed pa nos nye bar bzung ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam
135b7('bum): yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa/ 
135b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun myi 'chad pa'i don du bzhugs pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136a1('bum): slar ldog pa 'am/ slar myi ldog pa 'am gang gi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
136a2('bum): po ni phyir myi ldog pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstan pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod/ de dag la 'a
136a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ 
136a4('bum): pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bco/ rnam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su
136a5('bum): slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a// ngas de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ya nga ched du brjod pa mdzad de// rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa'
136a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rin cen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod
136a7('bum): pa mdzad do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad skye ba myed par mos kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa chos
136a8('bum): thams cad stong pa'o// zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog gsob ste/ rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang / snying po myed pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod
136b1('bum): ba thob pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas
136b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mying yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
136b3('bum): sa spangs pa yin te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang lung bstan pa yin nam// rab 'byor da byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod
136b4('bum): pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mying yongs su brjod// pa'i tshul gyis ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir myi ldog
136b5('bum): pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
136b6('bum): zab mo bshad pa thos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur myed cing the tsom myi za rmongs par mi 'gyur na des ni phyis
136b7('bum): kyang rgya cher nga bzhin gshegs pa dra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub seMs
136b8('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstand pa de bzhin du mos pas/ 
137a1('bum): phyir myi ldog pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor du ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos na ni phan pa mang por 'gyur ba
137a2('bum): yin te/ gang gis mos shing mos nas de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan byed pa de dag kyang smos kyang myi smos te/ de dag de bzhin nyid de gnas de bzhin nyid la nan tan byas nas
137a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid du gnas nas de bzhin du nan tan bgyis te/ chos gang la yang ma dmigs na de ji ltar
137a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba la gas/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma rtogs ba'i chos gang yang mi dmyigs na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la
137a5('bum): gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su m+bi/ ga de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/ chos ston par 'gyur/ 
137a6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su ma mchis na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
137a7('bum): rgyab dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur bar lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorarang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du gang
137a8('bum): skad du/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgyab dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par
137b1('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid ma rtogs par gzhan du dmyigs su myed de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmyigs su myed na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas
137b2('bum): te/ bla na myed la yang dag par rdzogs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed de zhes
137b3('bum): zer ba ni rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na myed pa yang dag par
137b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshadab dang gangade bzhin nyid la gnas shing / chos stonang pa'agyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang la yang de bzhin nyid mchog
137b5('bum): par gzhan dmyigs su med na de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
137b6('bum): par 'tshang rgya bo dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos stond par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang
137b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin po de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid ni gnas skye/ 
137b8('bum): chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid 'di/ 
138a1('bum): la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de la gnas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la gnas shing chos ston pa
138a2('bum): 'gyur ba'i lta ci smos te de ni gnas myed do// de nas lho'i dbang po brgya byin gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni zab ste/ bcom ldan
138a3('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'chel ba de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan
138a4('bum): 'das chos gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis te/ su yang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa mchis la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba gang yang ma mchis te/ 
138a5('bum): chos ston pa gang yang ma mchis lnga des kyang zhum par yang myi 'gyu ra zhing de dag le nem du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis po'i dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor/ 
138a6('bum): gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gang khyod gis ji skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du mi 'gyur/ rmongs
138a7('bum): par myi 'gyur/ rmongs par myi 'gyur ba'i dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsol pa ni ke'u shi ka chos thams cad ni stong pa yin na de la nam nur du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ gnas brtan
138a8('bum): rab 'byor nga ni gang ngo ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing stong pa de de la chags pa myed do// 'di lta ste dper na bar snang la 'phags pa'i mda' ni cil yang chags pa myed de/ de bzhin nyid du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis chos
138b1('bum): bstan pa yang ci la yang chags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las na le'u ban+te bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bco/ 
138b2('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags bdag gis de skad du gsolang to// de skad du brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / ched du brjod cing chos kyis gnyer ba'i chos nyid
138b3('bum): yang dag par lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te/ de skad du brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / rjes
138b4('bum): su brjod cing chos kyis gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung ston par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor nga 'di ci dang ci spobs pa de thams cad stong pa nyid de brtsams shing
138b5('bum): spobs/ mtshan ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ smond pa ma mchis pa nyid martsams shing spobs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi dran pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
138b6('bum): brtsams shing spobs bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ shes rab kyi
138b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs// nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtsams shing spobs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsums shing spobs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs
138b8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid martsams shing spobs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid martsams shing spobs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
139a1('bum): nyid brtsams shing spobs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chos thams ca
139a2('bum): stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsnams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
139a3('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams brtsams shing baspobs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang
139a4('bum): pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ dbang po rnams brtsams shing da spobs/ stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/ byang chub kyi yan/ lag rnams brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
139a5('bum): lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan rnams brtsams shing spo bas/ tshad myed pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzugs myed
139a6('bum): kha'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam sa brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo
139a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa brtsams shing spobs mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams shing spo
139a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/ myi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ snying rje chen po brtsams shing spobs
139b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shis/ 
139b2('bum): spobs/ dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar
139b3('bum): che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor de stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
139b4('bum): pa lta ci smos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ lta ci smos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
139b5('bum): gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ brtse na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang blo// rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ji smos/ bsam/ 
139b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rold tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmyigs na/ gang bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
139b7('bum): la spyod pa lta ci smos// nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa ci smos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lnga ji smos/ phyi nang stong pa
139b8('bum): nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chen po stong pa nyid la bsgom
140a1('bum): pa lta ci smos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na// gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 
140a2('bum): la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mtha'
140a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
140a4('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chos thams
140a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chos thams cad stong pa 'o// nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom
140a6('bum): ba lta ci smos/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa na gang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ji smos/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dngos po myed
140a7('bum): pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po myed de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dngos po myed par
140a8('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang myi dmyig spya na
140b1('bum): gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dbang po rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang dbang po rnams la
140b2('bum): bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang stobs rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags
140b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsgom pa lnga
140b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang bsam gtan rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshad myed pa myed pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ gzugs myed
140b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang rnam par tha rad
140b6('bum): pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang myi dmyigs na/ gang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar
140b7('bum): 'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la dmyigs na/ gang rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myi
140b8('bum): dmyigs na gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang gzungs
141a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la bsgoms pa lta ci smos/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang
141a2('bum): myi dmyigs na/ gang myi dmyigs pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang
141a3('bum): myi dmyigs na gang snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mngon
141a4('bum): par sgrub pa ji smos// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyi gas na gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na nga lan/ 
141a5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ phyir myi// 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ dgra bcom pa nyid
141a6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na gang dgra bcom pa nyid rjes su thob pa lta ci smos rang byang chub nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras su rang byang chub rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ lam gyi rnam
141a7('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rjes su thob pa'i lta ci smos/ rnam pa mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa lta ci smos
141a8('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'gyur ba la ci smos/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa lta ci smos/ mtshan ma/ 
141b1('bum): rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang gis lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ dpe byad rnams kyang myi dmyigs na gang rang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gnas
141b2('bum): brtan rab 'byor da ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ dmyigs su myed pa la rnam par spyod/ stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod/ mtshan ma myed pa la rnam par spyod/ smon pa myed pa la rnam par
141b3('bum): spyod// ke'u shi ka gnas brten rab 'byor kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa la rnam por spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
141b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nyo bar myi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// brgya phragastong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang
141b5('bum): bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba ste/ nga gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi tshar yang nye bar
141b6('bum): myi 'gri'o// grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa mi rtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
141b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa
141b8('bum): de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o// rab ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gya nom
142a1('bum): pa zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa gong na myed pa mnyam pa myed pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhes bya'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi mchog du gyur par
142a2('bum): 'dod pas 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
142a3('bum): dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su skyong
142a4('bum): bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
142a5('bum): rjes su thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyo na mongs pa thams cad spangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// 
142a6('bum): shes rab bam po / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams me tog man dar ba mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor
142a7('bum): mngon par gtord to// rab du gtor to// dge slong drug cu tsam yang snyan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
142a8('bum): der logs su thal mo sbyar dpa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la myig 'dzum par lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbya rad te bdud pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa men tog man
142b1('bum): dar ba gang bar gyur nas/ me tog man da ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par gtord to// rab 'du ga to rang to// de ltar
142b2('bum): 'thor zhing mngon par gtor ba dang / rab du 'thor ba'i tshe tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa'i rnam par
142b3('bum): spyod pa dam pas bdag cag rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gis bsam pa thugs su chud de/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom
142b4('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de ste/ de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i che bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'di lta/ ste/ 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang
142b5('bum): dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul dgyi kha dog lta bu rnam par sna tshogs byung ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang rgyas par bkang nas
142b6('bum): phyir 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dgo' stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig du byas te
142b7('bum): bud mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
142b8('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu'i rkyen kyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol de pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
143a1('bum): dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// dga' bo dge slong brgya phrag drug cu po 'di dag la bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
143a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo men tog sil ma zhes
143a3('bum): bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun mtshungs par 'gyur// tshe'i tshad kyang 'di lta ste lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gang na gang dang gang
143a4('bum): nas mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par byung nas bla na myed pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dra dang de dag du me tog kha tog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i men tog gi
143a5('bum): char mngon par bab par 'gyur ro// dga' ba de bas ni byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa'i dam pas/ rnam par spyad par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143a6('bum): la spyad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i rnam par spyad par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las spyad par bya'o// dga' bo
143a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ltar de dag ni mye'i nang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skye ba 'am dga' ldan gyi lha'i
143a8('bum): ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te/ myi'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'o/ 
143b1('bum): zhes rtogs par rig par bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par lta ste/ dga' bo
143b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
143b3('bum): byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di stond cing rjes su 'debs shing gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des bdag gi de bzhin gshegs
143b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par 'gyur/ gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas
143b5('bum): par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i rtsa ba mang po skyed par gyu rang to zhes bya bar rtogs
143b6('bum): par rig par bya ste/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag gis ni nyan thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par
143b7('bum): bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me des bdag gis ni nyan thos rnams las sha dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa nyan thos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
143b8('bum): dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang don dang / yi ge dang chos dang mthun par khong du chud par byed na/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dos bdag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
144a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur te zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// dga'o rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa
144a2('bum): thob par gyur dan/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs
144a3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lta yang mi smra ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam
144a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas su gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khri mos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i
144a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang
144a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyin nga stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa
144a7('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa skye bo nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa pa nyid la spyod pa dang
144a8('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod
144b1('bum): pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par
144b2('bum): spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
144b3('bum): brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang
144b4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i ste/ mas par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad po'i sgo stong pa dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang
144b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la/ spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang myi 'jigs pa
144b6('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod
144b7('bum): pa dang / san cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir myo 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang / lam gi rna mi
144b8('bum): shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa shes po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pas rtogs par rig par bya'o// shin du rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
145a1('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pa 'omang du phyin pas spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pharo slong du byin
145a2('bum): pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / gnang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / byinang stong pa nyid la smod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa
145a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang
145a4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams da stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
145a5('bum): la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 
145a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod
145a7('bum): pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngapa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / gzug
145a8('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod
145b1('bum): pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
145b2('bum): spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag por rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas
145b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos sam rang sangs
145b4('bum): su myi 'gyur ro// dga' bo de bas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la btad de/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang ji snyed cig bshad pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
145b5('bum): rtogs par ngas chos bstan pa de dag thams cad bzung ste kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og du chud bzan te bor yang de tsam gyis da ga' bo khyod la skyon du ngas myi rtse'o dga'o gal te khyod
145b6('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di gzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og du chud gzan tam bor bar gyur na des dag 'bo khyod dus skyon du ga zung ngo // dga' ba des na shes
145b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad kyis ci nas kyang bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / shin du yid la gzung bar gyis shig legs par spongs
145b8('bum): su zin pa dang / logs par kun chub pa dang / legs par bcang bar gyis shig/ yi ge dang tshig dang 'bru shin du rdzogs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig legs par shin du zin par bya'o// dga' bo ragra/ 
146a1('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bab mo 'di 'dzand pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa 'di 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / 
146a2('bum): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub gzung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa
146a3('bum): res ni 'odas pa dang / me byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub mthun par yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang la la mngon du gyur bar gang la me tog dang 'phreng
146a4('bum): bdang spos dang / byug po dang / b+he ma dang / rnam gza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dan gyis rim 'gror bya ba dang bkur skor bya ba dang phung dud du bya ba dang / 
146a5('bum): mchod par byab 'dod pas shes rab kyi ma ma tu phyin pa zab mo 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pa med tu phyin pa zab mo/ 
146a6('bum): di gzung ste/ bcangs nas klags shing kun chub par bya ste/ men tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdun
146a7('bum): gyis rim 'gror bya/ bkur stir byu phud dud du bya/ mchod par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phung dud dang / mchod par byas nas des ni nga yang mchod/ 
146a8('bum): par 'gyur/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
146b1('bum): pas rim gror dang / dga' ba dang / mos bskyed pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim 'gro dang / dga' ba dang / mos pa skyed par 'gyun
146b2('bum): dga' bo gal te khyod la nga sdug cing yid du 'ong ba la yongs su ma btang zhe na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba yongs su myi btang bar gyis shig
146b3('bum): ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las tshig 'ga' yang khyod kyis chung ma zos par gyis shig/ dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha ro long du phyin pa zab mo 'di btang pa brtsams te
146b4('bum): khyod la shin du mang du bstan pa yang mdor na dga' bo khyod la ngaci ltar ston par 'gyur ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang khyod kyi stond pa yin gyis dga' bo de bas na ngas khyod la chang
146b5('bum): myed par gtad pas shes rab kyi pha'i yong tu phyin pa zab mo 'ad yongs su btad de/ dga' bo de bas na lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du brjod de/ sus sangs rgyas/ 
146b6('bum): yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma bta nga ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
146b7('bum): yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btang
146b8('bum): bar myi bya ste/ 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'phel bar byed
147a1('bum): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnam grangs du mar rgya cher 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / 
147a2('bum): rab tu ston pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me den
147a3('bum): myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no// de ci'i phyir/ 
147a4('bum): zhe na/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyide bzhin
147a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya// sa gang ci snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag/ gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
147a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bom 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
147a7('bum): de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo ltar byung ba'i dus na shar phyogs kyi 'jog rten gyi khams cad
147a8('bum): myed grangs myed dpag du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas
147b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
147b2('bum): tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
147b3('bum): 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga'
147b4('bum): bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tsha de myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa da ga bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
147b5('bum): gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
147b6('bum): tu phyin pa las byung po'i/ dga' bo de ltar byung ba'i dus na byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
147b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi
147b8('bum): pha romo tsun pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo ltar byung ba'i dus na bya shar gyi phyogs mtshamos kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed glings myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa/ 
148a1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de drug gi bla na myed pa yang
148a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid las byung ba // dga' bod lhur byung ba'i dus na sher lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jog rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag du
148a3('bum): myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub
148a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dgra na de bzhin gshegs pa
148a5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang rdza snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa sa/ ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag
148a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi da las byung ngo // dga' bo da lhor byung ba'i dus na nub byang gi phyi gas mtshams kyi 'jog rten gyi khams tshad myong grangs myed
148a7('bum): dpag du myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang rdo skad cig bzhugs shing 'chi spyod pa dang / chos ston pa de'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dres 'dag
148a8('bum): sem gyid pa ga pa rdzogs par byang chub chu gas rab kyil tshun pa nyid las byung ngo // ga ba kyi byung ba'adus ni mig gzugs gi shing garten gyi chis chad byed bye sa byed pan
