180b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor/ 
180b8('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'dod pa las dben sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos las dben/ rtog pa deng bcas pa/ 'byor pa dang bcas pa
181a1('bum): cagadaben pa las skyes pa dga' ba dang / bde'i can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs/ 
181a2('bum): te gnas so// bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// snying rje la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// btang snyoms la nye bar
181a3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so
181a4('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs teganas so// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// sems dang sems byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa
181a5('bum): gang skyes pa thams cad dang rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yo ngas su sngo'o// de yang ci nas kyang de'i tshe/ bsam gtan deng bas ma gtan gyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs pa de ltar yongs su sngo ste/ 
181a6('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub seMs
181a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po babod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dil byang chub sems
181a8('bum): pa sems dpa chen po// bamed pa'i ba mi tshun pa gnas shing gangan mi chos rnams na pa'i rnam pa'amani pa rnam pa ma/ phyib pa'i rnam pa' tshas kyi'is sus gang gangs kyang mo bya
181b1('bum): ma 'dun dur rungs 'di dan gaspya du byed/ slong po kyang chub jugags kyang rnam pams ca das bya ma cang bar byedang/ delam sa mnas tham sa bya bar ba yang no te/ 
181b2('bum): ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// ci nas kyang myi spong ba myi 'dzind pa de ltar yongs su 'dzin to// gsol/ 
181b3('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
181b4('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing lus dang ste rnams kyi brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yin te/ bdag gis bla na myed pa
181b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya bar myi bya'i/ bdag gis gdon myi za bar bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// zhes de seMs
181b6('bum): jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye bskyong ngas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ga khrag khrig bang+gA sno dag tus nang brtsor 'dzus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
181b7('bum): lung du sems can pag sa sa byang chub la gnang go// gas te gang sa byang chub sems pa 'theg pa dang ma thadad pa ga tug ga thos kyi phrin pa ni dmas pa can non no// 
182a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas la rab tu gzhog te/ chung ngu na sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu gzhog go// des chos kyi sbyin pa de yang sbyin pa de dag sbyin nas zang zing gyi sbyin pas sems can/ 
182a2('bum): rnams tshim par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo li/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste trarab 'byor
182a3('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
182a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing tshul khrims kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdaka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
182a5('bum): sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi 'a ra du bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spong yin/ gzhan yang srog pa/ cod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ srog gcod pa'i spong ba legs
182a6('bum): ba brjod pa yin/ gzhan yang srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spong ba yin/ gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba sa yang dag par skul ba yin ma byin pa/ 
182a7('bum): len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis ma byind par lend pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dag par byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang 'dod pa log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dod pas log par
182a8('bum): gsem par spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis
182b1('bum): kyang rdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzun du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gyis rdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed/ 
182b2('bum): pa yin bdag gis kyang phra ma spangs pa yin gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skal ba yin phra ma spongs pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin gzhan gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' ba byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang
182b3('bum): zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/ gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/ gzhan gang gis zhag cang dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin// bdag gis kyang tshig khyal pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang
182b4('bum): tshig khyal pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshig khyal pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gi tshig khyal pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis
182b5('bum): kyang chags sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang chags sems spong ba/ nyel yang dag par skul ba yin/ chags sems spong ba'i legs/ pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis chags sems spong ba de dag gi legs
182b6('bum): pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis
182b7('bum): gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin bdag gis log par lta ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ log par lta ba spong ba'i leg
182b8('bum): pa brjod pa yin gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun par byed pa yin te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des 'dod pas khams su gnas par myi byed/ gzugs kyi khams su
183a1('bum): gnas par myi byed/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su gnas par myi byed/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par myi byed do// gzhan du na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad thun mong du byas
183a2('bum): shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ ci nas kyang gang yongs su sngo ba dang / gang gis yongs su sngo ba dang / gang la yongs su sngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs
183a3('bum): su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das
183a4('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyipha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu nad pa yongs su 'dzinang pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
183a5('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snyi po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du myi 'gyur ba 'am myi ma yin par gyur pa/ 
183a6('bum): sems rnam par 'khrug par myi byang bas/ yan lag dang nying lag bcad rngubs shing khyer te/ dong yang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa de 'di snyam du bdag
183a7('bum): las ci zhig g.yod/ bdag las ci zhig gtubs so// bdag las ci zhig khyer ro snyam myi sems te/ gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems so// gang gi phyir bdag gi lus yongs su chubs pa de dag 'di ltar 'dir 'ong zhing yan/ 
183a8('bum): lag dang nying lag bcad chubs nas khyer zhing 'dod pa na bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo snyam mo// de nas chos kyi rang bzhin yang legs par yod la bya bas ma yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am ra
183b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngo'i/ gzhan du sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dang bas dpan brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
183b3('bum): tu phyind pa gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge
183b4('bum): ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas/ dpe dran pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par
183b5('bum): spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dag 'a ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ 
183b6('bum): de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang / bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan la bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms
183b7('bum): pa zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i byas ma gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de 'i sang spangs sdug sngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde pa dang yid myi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsdu
183b8('bum): ba yang byed/ bdeng snyoms padran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan pa ni mi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshang byed pa la nye bar bsgrubs te zhes
184a1('bum): sems can rnams la sdug bsngal dang / bde ba myed pa'i 'du shes yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad myed pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de la gzugs la tshe long du 'du shes shing nam mkha' la zhi bar 'du
184a2('bum): shes la yid la byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la tshe long du 'du shes shing / rnam par shes pa la zhi bar 'du shes yid la byed pas/ rnam shes
184a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par shes pa la che chung ngu 'du shes shing / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la che long du 'du shes shing
184a4('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la bye/ pas 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang gzugs
184a5('bum): myed pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam pa la smin pa yongs su myi len te/ gzhan du na sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir deg tu skye zhing / sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa
184a6('bum): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirnyed pa dang / pha rol / 
184a7('bum): phyind pa drug po 'di dag la yongs su smind par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ rab 'byor de lta
184a8('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses
184b1('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
184b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar
184b3('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
184b4('bum): su myi mthong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par
184b5('bum): rjes su myi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang / mtshan mar/ yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas da nga mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa
184b6('bum): nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang / mtshan mar ya/ 
184b7('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'dus
184b8('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma myed
185a1('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang / mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos
185a2('bum): po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan ma ra yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas
185a3('bum): dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes
185a4('bum): su myi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su
185a5('bum): myi mthong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // yang dag par spong ba bzhi dngos po dang mtshan mardzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mtho
185a6('bum): ngo rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // dbang po lnga dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mor yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // stobs lnga dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag
185a7('bum): par rjes su myi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi
185a8('bum): mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bsam gtan bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // tshad myed pa bzhi dngos po dang / 
185b1('bum): rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar
185b2('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed
185b3('bum): pa dang smond pa myed pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzind rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan/ 
185b4('bum): mar yang dag par rjes su myi thong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag pa
185b5('bum): rjes su myi mthong ngo // myi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan ma ra yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // 
185b6('bum): snying rje chen po dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // thams cad shes pa nyid dngos po
185b7('bum): dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan
185b8('bum): mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // ste chos thams cad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong pos chos gang la yang gnas myi 'cha' zhing / de ji skad du smra ba de ltar byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor dade/ 
186a1('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// 
186a2('bum): shes rab / bam po// // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
186a3('bum): phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa si yongs su 'dzin dpa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ sdig
186a4('bum): myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ spyong da pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
186a5('bum): rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa myed pa// dpa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can
186a6('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bar dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin dang btang snyoms la gnas te bde ba lus kyis long lo/ 'phags pa rnams kyis
186a7('bum): de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrungs te gnas so// bde ba yang sngangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shi
186a8('bum): yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas nub pas de bde ba yang myed sdug sngal yang myed pa btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du/ 
186b1('bum): gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
186b2('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so// zhes te rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te/ 
186b3('bum): gnas so// dernam pa thams pa dadu nam shes mtha' las sgro mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed sbyin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bsam gtan gyi ba ro ma tu phyis
186b4('bum): ba de la gnas nas myi g.yeng ba'i yid kyis/ sems can de dag la zang zing gyi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi ston pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang zang bring gyi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa la yang dag par skul la bang / 
186b5('bum): zing gyi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa'i legs pa yang brjod do// ga/ zhan ya gang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa yang brjod cing mthun pas dga'
186b6('bum): bar byed pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sdom/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa
186b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sa
186b8('bum): yongs su 'dzind to/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su
187a1('bum): 'dzi rang pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa'i sems 'dod chags dang ldan
187a2('bum): pa myi skyed/ sems zhe sdang dang ldan pa myi skyed/ sems gti mug dang ldan pa myi skyed/ sems 'tshe ba dang ldan pa myi skyed do// gzhan du na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod/ 
187a3('bum): de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myo sto'o/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su sngo ste/ ra/ 
187a4('bum): 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa yongs su 'dzind to/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ 
187a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin// da pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
187a6('bum): rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gta na gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / gzugs la dbu ba lta bur rab tu gtog/ tshor ba la chu bur lta bur rab tu rtog/ 'du shes pa
187a7('bum): smyig rgyu lta bur rab tu rtog/ 'du byed la chu shing lta bur rab tu rtog/ rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog ste/ de nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la so sor rtog pa cing / snying po myed par 'du shes la nye bar gnas pa
187a8('bum): yin te/ de de ltar so sor rtog pas de 'di snyam ste yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing brngubs kyang su la gcod su la bcad/ lus na su'i lus/ tshor ba na su'i tshor ba/ 'du shes na su'i 'du shes/ 'du byed na su'i 'du bye/ 
187b1('bum): rnam par shes pa na su'i rnam par shes pa/ sam ste/ de de ltar na so sor rtog pa'i tshe 'di sem ste/ gang la spyod pa dang bkyal ba byas nas gnod soms skye ba de lta bu'i gshel ba gang yang gang zhig yod/ khyal pa yang gang
187b2('bum): mig yongasam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu byon pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji lar
187b3('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da 'di/ 
187b4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin// da pa la gnas shing / 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos// kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa
187b5('bum): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur
187b6('bum): pas rtog pa myed pa spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyind gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral nas dran pa dang ldan
187b7('bum): ning shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtanagasuM
187b8('bum): pA la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba dang snga nas kyang nub pas bde pa yang myed sdug sngal ba yang myed pa bdang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i
188a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag la yang dag mtshan mar myi 'dzind to// de de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang / 
188a2('bum): ldan pas rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas nyams su myong bar byed de/ sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo' bar byed do// gcig tu gyur da cing mang por 'gyur ro// mang por gyur da cing gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang myi snang ba ya/ 
188a3('bum): nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsig pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa myed par 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste dper na 'dab
188a4('bum): chags bya bzhin no/ sa la yang gyen du byung ba dang 'og tu 'byung bar byed de/ dper na tshul bya bzhin no// chu la yang bying ba myed par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya bzhin no/ du bar 'thul zhing myen
188a5('bum): 'bar te/ dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe la 'di ltar mthu che zhing dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rgya
188a6('bum): bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// de lha'i rna ba rnam par dga' ba myi las 'ongs pas/ lnga dang myi'i sgra nye ba 'am ring yang rung ste thos so// des sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol tu gyi sems sos/ 
188a7('bum): kyis yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
188a8('bum): sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i seMs la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang
188b1('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang tu shes so// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sem
188b2('bum): shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred
188b3('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar lend pa/ 
188b4('bum): dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar le nad pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya/ bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar le nangapa myed pa'i sems la nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems shes bya/ 
188b5('bum): bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus pa'i sems las kun nas 'dus pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par spros pa'i sos
188b6('bum): la rnam par spros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya chung ba'i sems la rgya chung ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya che ba'i sems
188b7('bum): la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad myed pa'i sems la
188b8('bum): tshad myed pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
189a1('bum): mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa jiH
189a2('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gang zag dang bcas pa'i sems la ga zag dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa myed pa'i sems la zag pa myed pa'i sems zhes bya ba yang
189a3('bum): drug pa ji lnga ba bzhin durab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa myed
189a4('bum): sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na/ yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag dpa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na myed pa ya'i sems la bla na myed
189a5('bum): pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mas rjes su dran pa te/ sems ga/ cig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i bar du yang dag rjes su dran no/ 
189a6('bum): nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// zla ba gcig kyang rjes su dran pa zla ba brgya'i bar du yang dag par rjes su dran no// lo gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas lo'i brgya'i bar du yang dag rjes su
189a7('bum): dran no// bskalang ba cig kyang rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// bdag na da lta bu zhag na 'dug 'dug ste/ mya ngan 'ad zhes bya/ rus na 'ad zhes bya/ rags na'ang zhes bya/ kha zas na
189a8('bum): ga rgya zag du ses su ni// phanal pa nang phrag dum yid rjes su da / ngan la 'a rgya gang dum migs su dradado/ brga ya ba byeg khrag thog slong dusas rjes su dra to// ga rings dran/ 
189b1('bum): na 'dug 'dug ste/ mying ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid gcig tu 'dug 'dug/ che'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur da na te/ de ltar bdag de nas
189b2('bum): shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas/ dun rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gi sngon gyi gnas
189b3('bum): rnam pa du mas rjes su dran no// de ni lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang kha tog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang
189b4('bum): bde bgro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gyis ngan spyod pa dang ldan yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs
189b5('bum): pa log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas pa/ na song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par
189b6('bum): pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis le gas par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa myi 'debs po/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas
189b7('bum): bde 'gro mtho'i ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis rlas pa/ nam mkha'i mthar gtugs pa dag gi 'gro / 
189b8('bum): drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la rab tu gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyend bkur bya ba dang / yongs
190a1('bum): su 'dri ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs pa dang / sems can yongs su smind par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sas
190a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngo'o/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pani
190a3('bum): byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing ci nas kyang gang yongs su sngo ba dang / ci yongs su sngo ba dang / gang la yongs su sngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
190a4('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / ba rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sngo 'dzin to// gsodapa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
190a5('bum): chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la gnas shing / shes rakyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sem
190a6('bum): dpanga' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha ro so tu phyin pa la gnas pas/ gzugs myi dmyigs sa tshor ba myi dmyigs so// 'du shes myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so
190a7('bum): myig myi dmyigs so// rnab myi dmyigs so// sna myi dmyigs so// lce myi dmyigs so// lus myi dmyigs so// yid myi dmyigs so// gzugs myi dmyigs so// sgra myi dmyigs so// dmyi dmyigs so// ro myi dmyigs so/ 
190a8('bum): rig kyi dbyigs so// chos myi dmyigs so// myig gyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// na ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par
190b1('bum): shes pa myi dmyigs so// yod kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs
190b2('bum): so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// sna'i
190b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
190b4('bum): ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs so// sa'i khams myi dmyigs so// chu'ide khams myi dmyigs so// me'i khams myi dmyigs so// rlung gi khams myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs
190b5('bum): so/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs so// ma rig pa myi dmyig sa so// 'du byed myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myi dmyi/ gas so// mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug myi
190b6('bum): dmyigs so// reg pa myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myi dmyigs so// sred pa myi dmyigs so// le nad pa myi dmyigs so// srid pa myi dmyigs so// skye ba myi dmyigs so// rga shi myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i
190b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi
190b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi
191a1('bum): dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
191a2('bum): myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin gi mtshan
191a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong pa myi dmyigs so// myi dmyig pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// ngo bo stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dran
191a4('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi mying dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// dang po lnga myi dmyigs so// stobs lnga myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems
191a5('bum): kyi yan lag bdun myi dmyigs s+ho/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya da pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi myi dmyig sa so// bsam gtan bzhi myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa bzhi myi
191a6('bum): dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar da pa brgyad myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
191a7('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang spornyed pa myed pa myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzind rnams myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi rgya/ 
191a8('bum): so rgyu 'jigs po ba'i phyi dmyigs so// seMs yang dag par rig pa ba'i myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// 
191b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa yang de nyid myi dmyigs po/ rang byang chub myi dmyigs so// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rnam
191b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend nyid myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas kyi khams myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid khams myi dmyigs so// de ltar myi dmyigs pas na mngon par 'du myi byed do// mngon par 'du myi byed pas/ 
191b3('bum): na/ skye bar myi byed 'gag par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir na na/ rab 'byor dade ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi gnas nyid de ni gas
191b4('bum): pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gnas pa'i phyir de myi skye myi 'dag pas de g.yeng ba myed pa'i sems dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyenand pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral ba yin te/ rab 'byor
191b5('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi// pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das rdzi
191b6('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa yong su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191b7('bum): dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa'o// zhes byas par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
191b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces la byang chub sems dpa' semams dpa' chen po zhen
192a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid la sa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang
192a2('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// don dum pa nyid sa don dam pa s+ho/ 
192a3('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las
192a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa rje stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyis
192a5('bum): la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// rang bzhi// na stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ces bya bar myi dmyigs so/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid
192a6('bum): ces bya bar myi dmyigs so/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi man nyid stong pa nyid la ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po de ltar stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de ngag la gnas
192a7('bum): shing / gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am myi sbyong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'du shes stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ 'a
192a8('bum): byed stod zhes bya ba'am gyi gong zhes bya bang myi dmyigs so// rnam pa shes pa so zhes bya ba'am gyi sgong zhes byab myi phyogs so// rgyag dnganas bya ts+tsha rmugs so// rab blo zhes bya ba 'am chu 'anganas
192b1('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so// sna stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lce stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lus stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyig
192b2('bum): so yang stong zhes bya ba 'am skyo stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// gzugs spong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// sgra stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dri stong zhes bya babs myi stong
192b3('bum): zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// ro stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// reg stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// chos stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya
192b4('bum): bar myi dmyigs so// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ma myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sto/ nga zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so sna'i rnam pa
192b5('bum): shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes
192b6('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rna ba'i 'dus
192b7('bum): te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes
192b8('bum): bya bar myi dmyigs so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi dmyigs so// myig gi 'dus
193a1('bum): ma gte reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so sna'i 'a
193a2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bri stong zhes bya ba 'amam+b+ha stong zhes bya bar myi myigs so/ rje'i 'dus te reg pa lus byung ba'i tshor ba stong shes bya ba 'am myi snod zhes byu byar / myigs so// lus kyi
193a3('bum): rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am rgya stong zhes bya ba myi dmyigs so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la sa byung ba'i tshor ba stong shes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// so'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am rmyi sa/ 
193a4('bum): zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// me'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/ myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so bar/ rlung gi khas stong zhes bya ba 'a
193a5('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa khams stong zhes bya ba ma'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// ma
193a6('bum): pastong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'du byed sdong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// mying dang gzugs stong ni/ 
193a7('bum): bya ba 'am myi sbyong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// skye mched drug stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong
193a8('bum): chos bya bar rgya phyogs so// sring po gang zhes bya ba 'ang myi slong gis bya 'i 'tsho tshigs so// led pa stong zhes bya ba lam kyi stong nas bya bar myi phyogs so// drang pa stong nas bya bajas rgya ba zhes bya bar gyi skyen sa/ 
193b1('bum): skye ba stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rga shi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// sbyin pa'i pha pha rol tu phyin pa 'astong shes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba' myi dmyigs so// tshul khris
193b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am
193b3('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// nang
193b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// / phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyig
193b5('bum): so/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi spong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/ 
193b6('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa
193b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi spyong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong po nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myo stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes rgya
193b8('bum): bar byi byigs so/ rang banin spong banyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi sto zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ chos thams cad spong banyid stong zhes bya ba 'as gyi stong des bya ba myi dmyigs so// 'ang gi ma tshad nyid spong ba 'i / 
194a1('bum): zhes byab sa rgya byung zhes byang myed byugs so// rgyur phyogs pa skyong ba nyidadi stong zhes bya ba 'am rgya skyong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dngos po skyed pa spyong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am mya spang zhes bya bar myi
194a2('bum): so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong zhes bya 'am mya
194a3('bum): stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// dbang po lnga ste
194a4('bum): zhes bya ba 'am myo stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// stobs lnga stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
194a5('bum): so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong/ zhe bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bani stong na/ sa bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan cis
194a6('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa ban stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// gzugs mye dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba'i stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar/ 
194a7('bum): myi dmyigs so// gzugs myang pa' se rnam par tharang pa'i brgyad stong zhes bya ba ma myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba'am myo stong zhes bya ba myi dmyis
194a8('bum): so/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ 
194b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi
194b2('bum): stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa 'a ni stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// snying rje chen po stong
194b3('bum): zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bcwo brgyad stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya
194b4('bum): bar myi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong pa'i bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs
194b5('bum): so// dgra bcom pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi da myigs so// rang byang chub stong zhes bya bar myi dmyig stong zhe sa bya bar myi dmyigs so// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
194b6('bum): byang chub stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya ba
194b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / zas sam/ skom 'am bzhon pa 'am/ gos sam/ me tog gam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ spos sam
194b8('bum): byug pa 'am/ mal cha'am/ gnas sam/ 'tsho ba 'am/ yo byad dam/ myi'i yod byad gang ci yang rung ba'i sbyin pa gang dang / gang gtong ba des sbyin pa de stong zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngoHgang
195a1('bum): yongs su gtong ba dang / gang la yongs su gtong ba de yang stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de la 'jungs pa'i sems yongs su 'dzind pa'i sems kyi skabs myed do// de ci'i phyir
195a2('bum): zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du rnam par rtog pa de dag thams
195a3('bum): cad myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs
195a4('bum): sam/ yongs su 'dzind pa'i thugs myi mnga' ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dra ba spyod pa la 'jungs pa'i sems sam/ yongs su 'dzind pa'i sems
195a5('bum): skye ba myed do// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos stond pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / 
195a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gan+d+ha
195a7('bum): shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
195a8('bum): gnas shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i go skabs myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gang yongs su sngo ba de ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs/ 
195b1('bum): rgyas kyi sa 'am sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang myi dmigs so// sems de yang myi dmyigs so// de sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la bdug gi bar bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa
195b2('bum): yin/ gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gyis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthund
195b3('bum): pas dga' bar byed pa yin bdag gis kyang ma byind par len pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang ma byind par lend pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa
195b4('bum): yin/ gzhan gang bdag gis ma byin par lend pa spangs pa ya de dag gi legs pa brjod pa cing mthun pas dga' bar bye da pa yin/ bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa
195b5('bum): spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa/ spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'dod pas lo// par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang chu
195b6('bum): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa sbyangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang rdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzun du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ brdzun
195b7('bum): dum+b+ha bstong ba'i legs pa 'arjid pa yin/ gzhan gang gis brdzun du sgrubasas pa mdongon ni legs pa 'dzi ci mdzu pas dgu ba pa yin/ bdag gis kyang tham smra basmras pa 'ini/ nanas
195b8('bum): ba ba la yang dag par phrul ba 'ing/ bra ma grang ba'i legs pa tshomigs pa rjod pa tshad/ gzhan gang gis phram smras pa de dag gi rigs pa 'ad cing mthu pas dag par byed do// bdag gis kyi'i rje
196a1('bum): pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba'i yin/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis zhe cod pa'i tshig spangs pa de dag gi
196a2('bum): legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang tshig khyal pa spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang tshig khyal pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ tshig khyal pa'i smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa
196a3('bum): yin/ gzhan gang gis tshig khyal pa spongs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis chags sems spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par sku
196a4('bum): ba yin/ chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang / gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod pa yi// na/ cing mthun pas dga' byar byed pa yin/ bdag gis gnod// 
196a5('bum): sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ chags sems spang ba'i la gas gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yi ni/ gnod sems pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan
196a6('bum): gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/ bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ telog/ 
196a7('bum): par lta ba spangs pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa yin de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/ tshul khrims des nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
196a8('bum): chos gnyis la chags par myi 'gyur na/ gzhan man chad lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
196b1('bum): phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa/ 
196b2('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'apharal skyes te/ de 'di
196b3('bum): snyam du 'di la chos gang la yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'chi ba 'am gshe ba 'am/ 'khyal pa 'am/ bcad pa 'am/ gtub pa 'am rdeg pa 'am/ 'ching ba myed do snyam pas de la
196b4('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug/ gyi bar du/ gal te sems can thams cad drung du lhags nas spyos te bkyang tam/ rdo byugs kyis bdegs sam/ mtshon gyis btabs
196b5('bum): te/ bcad btubs kyang de la 'di snyam ste/ kye ma chos rnams kyi chos nyid// 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di la chos gang yang smyos pa 'am// bkyal ba 'am/ bcad pa 'am/ brngubs pa 'am tardeg pa'i
196b6('bum): bcing ba myed do snyam ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bzo da pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol pa
196b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
196b8('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas lus dang sems kyi
197a1('bum): brtson 'grus bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/ 'jig
197a2('bum): rten gyi khams bye ba brgya'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag tu song ste/ sems can rnams la chos stond cing
197a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rab tu 'god do/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rab tu 'god do/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la rab tu 'god do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la rab tu 'god do/ bsam
197a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rab tu 'god do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rab tu 'god do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rab tu 'god do/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu/ 
197a5('bum): 'god do lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// phyir/ myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do// dgra bcom pa nyid yang dag par nyid la rab tu 'god do// rang byang chub la rab tu rab tu 'god do// 
197a6('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'gad do// de ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab tu 'god pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa yang ma yin pa de ltar rab tu bkod do
197a7('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzind to// gsol dang / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byung
197a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la g.yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
197b1('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzind la ma gtogs pa'i nyan thos kyi sa 'am ting nge 'dzind tam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge
197b2('bum): 'dzind tam/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind kyang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzind gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug ste/ ting nge 'dzind de dag la gnas shing / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa
197b3('bum): dang / lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo // brgyad gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa dang
197b4('bum): po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang / ldan pas phyi rol kyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thard pa gnyi sa pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa
197b5('bum): thams cad mkhye du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam maH
197b6('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa/ 'di ni rnam par thard pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas
197b7('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad myed do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las nye bar
197b8('bum): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di/ 
198a1('bum): ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ni/ 
198a2('bum): de ltar rnam par tha rad pa brgyad po 'di dag lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang myi mthun pa la snyoms
198a3('bum): par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to// myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las
198a4('bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nas yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyu rad pas rtog pa myed pa
198a5('bum): spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam ga tan sa gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin
198a6('bum): du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
198a7('bum): gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug sngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub par bde ba yang myed sdug sngal ba yang myed btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gzhan bzhi pa la
198a8('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cig sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam ma
198b1('bum): mkha' mtha' yas so zhes/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam
198b2('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la sa yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
198b3('bum): so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// 'dus shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin
198b4('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'dus shes myed 'du shes myed myin marda skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa de dag la lugs dang mthun
198b5('bum): pa dang lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo // rna ma par tha rad pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag rnam par phye ste/ seng ge rnam pa/ 
198b6('bum): bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzind seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
198b7('bum): chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan
198b8('bum): dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gnyis pa langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi
199a1('bum): pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// nam mkha' mtha' las skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha'
199a2('bum): yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin
199a3('bum): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes
199a4('bum): myong myin gyi skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas
199a5('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod la sAlas nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// nam mkha' mtha' yas/ 
199a6('bum): skye mched las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan bon pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas bas
199a7('bum): gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan dang po snyoms par 'jug go// de seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di rnam par smind par byas
199a8('bum): nas/ thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par 'jug go// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzind thod rgal de gang zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
199b1('bum): chen po 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam/ 
199b2('bum): gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gnyis pa lus langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gsum pa
199b3('bum): las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha'
199b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la langs nas rnam she sa mtha' yas kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te ga nas so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
199b5('bum): las langs nas/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par drug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du
199b6('bum): shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar/ 
199b7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so
199b8('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug par las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go// sa pa la skams par bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
200a1('bum): 'jug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ 
200a2('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
200a3('bum): las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lci snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms pa
200a4('bum): 'jug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 
200a5('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// 'gos/ pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas cung zad myed pa'i skye ma/ ched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// cung zad/ 
200a6('bum): myed pa'i skye mched lce langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
200a7('bum): la snyoms par 'jug go// 'du shes myed 'du shes mye myin skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas mnyam par ma gzhag
200a8('bum): ba'i sems su byed do// mnyam par ma gnag pa'i sems las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'dug go// 'a'agog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas mnyam par ma gzhig pa'i
200b1('bum): sems la gnas so// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched gi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ 'du shes myed mdu shes myed myin skye mched lci smos
200b2('bum): par 'jug pa las langs nas/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so// mnyam par ma bzhag po'i sems las langs nas cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
200b3('bum): las langs nas mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems la gnas so// mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye la snyoms par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las la
200b4('bum): nas/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la gnas so// maHdam par ma gzhag pa'i sems las langs nas nam mkha' mtha'ayas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
200b5('bum): mched las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la genas/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan bzhi pa las
200b6('bum): langs nas mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i pa'i sems las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms lar 'jug go/ bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas
200b7('bum): mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i sems su byed do// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas mnyam
200b8('bum): par ma bzhag pa'i sems su byed do// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems las langs nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan dang po las langs nas mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i
201a1('bum): sems su byed do// de thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzind 'di la gnas shing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
201a2('bum): tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su 'dzin to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / 
201a3('bum): bam po // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
201a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de yun nga po ji srid cig nas yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ rab 'byor thabs mkhas pa
201a5('bum): de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'di ni bskal dpa bye ba khrag khrig grangs myed pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang / 
201a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub se/ 
201a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bkur bar rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des
201a8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bsgrub pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa des yongs su
201b1('bum): rdzogs par ma byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims bya ba de lta/ 
201b2('bum): bu gang yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs/ 
201b3('bum): rdzogs par ma byas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dos yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bya ba
201b4('bum): de lta bu gang yang myed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i bya ba de lta bu gang yang myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
201b5('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das/ kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de ba zhin te byang
201b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de dag ni ngo mtshar che'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gling bzhir las byed cing gling bzhi'i rjes su
201b7('bum): 'gro'o// gling bzhi'i rjes su 'brang ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i las byed bcing pha rol tu phyind pa lnga'i rjes su 'gro'o// pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i rjes su
201b8('bum): ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral na pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying 'thob po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying myi mthong po/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste
202a1('bum): dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bral nas rin po che sna bdun gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i mying myi thob po// rab 'byor de de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral na
202a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying myi thob po// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ khyim thab myed pa'i bud myed rnams ni 'phyon ma rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind Sha lta yang shes
202a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral na bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshugs par sla ba yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na gang khyim thab dang 'bos bsrungs pa'i bud myed shin tu phun sum tshogs pa khyim ni 'dug
202a4('bum): pa ni 'phyon ma rnams kyis myi tshugs pa yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang ma bral na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ros kyi lha rnams kyis myi tshugs pa yin no// 
202a5('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yul du 'gro ba'i skyes bu go// cha tshang bar gyon pa mtshon cha thams cad thogs pa ni/ g.yul/ ngor 'gro ba'i rgyal po'i zla ba'im phyir rgol ba dang ngagra rnams kyis thub
202a6('bum): par dga'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral na bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnam sa dang / gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can nam/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
202a7('bum): gdol pa rnams kyis kyang thub par dka'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la khams kyi rgyal po yod pa rnams ni/ nang nub nang nub rim 'gror bya ba'i don du drung du 'ong ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin
202a8('bum): du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su banan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang na ba der dong ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chu klung gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ni
202b1('bum): chu klung chen po gang ga gang na ba de der 'dong ngo // de dag chu klung gang ga dang 'grogs shing rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du dong ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zin na/ rnam
202b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang na ba der dong ngo // rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu'i lag pa g.yas pa ni dgos pa thams cad byed do// rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang de bzhin du lta ste/ pha rol
202b3('bum): tu phyind pa lnga ni lag pa g.yon pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na chu klung phra mo rnams dang / chu klung chen po rnams kyi chu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho chen pos phyind pa na
202b4('bum): 'di lta ste lan lhor ro gcig par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas so/ dngas su zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du phyind pa'i tshe
202b5('bum): 'di lta ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ror ro gcig par/ gyur ro// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du ni
202b6('bum): 'khor lo rin po che 'gro zhing 'dug ste/ gang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zas kyis don tu 'dug par chud pa der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gyi tshogs thams cad yongs su tshim par byed cing / 'khor lo
202b7('bum): rin po che de gnas nas 'pho ba myed do/ rab 'byed de bzhin du/ pha rold tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bkri ba yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na
202b8('bum): der song ste der gnas so// der gnas par gyur nas kyang gnas de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che de dang / blon po rin po che de dang khyim bdag
202b9('bum): rin po che de dang / bud myed rin po che de dang / nor bu rin po che de dang / glang po rin po che de dang / rta rin po che de dag ni dpung gi tshogs yan yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dong ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du shes
203a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po de dag gi mdun du 'gro ste/ mdun tu song nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
203a2('bum): tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rjes su 'brang ngo // snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du
203a3('bum): tu phyin pa rjes su 'brang ngo // snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gyi phyi bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rjes su 'brang ngo // snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pharo//
