203a4('bum): tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rjes su 'brang ngo // snyam du myi sems so// shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gi phyi bzhin du
203a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du chu sems so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang 'di snyam du bad ga ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi
203a6('bum): sems so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo // snyam du myi sems so// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa'ang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes
203a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du myi sems so// bas
203a8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha ro yod kyi phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo snyam du sems so// de ci'i phyir ne na/ de dag gi rang bzhin ni nga yin te/ ci yang nus pa myed pa
203b1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing gsog ste/ smyig rgyu ba lta bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
203b2('bum): pa stong pa lags na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
203b3('bum): la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
203b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' mon par rdzogs par 'o tshang rgya bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la
203b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni se rnams phyin ci log tu gyur pa ste/ de dag ni thabs la myi ma khas pas 'khor ba nas yongs su gdon par myi nus kyi nya ma la
203b6('bum): bdag gis sems can de dag gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyad par bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyo da par bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o// brtson 'phru
203b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind po la spyad par bya'o snyam nas/ de sems can de dag gi don tu phyi nang stong pa gi dngos po rnams
203b8('bum): yongs su gtong ste/ de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ bdag gis gang yang yongs su btang ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po 'di dag ni bdag nyid gcig pa'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar/ 
204a1('bum): yongs su rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// de sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu tshul khrims kyi ngan pa'i skabs myi skyed de
204a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.ye/ 
204a3('bum): pa dang / brdzun gyi tshig smra ba dang / phra ma can du 'gyur ba dang / zhe gcod pa smra ba dang / tshig khyal pa can du 'gyur ba dang / chags sems can du 'gyur ba dang / gnod sems can du 'gyur ba dang / log par
204a4('bum): lta ba can du 'gyur ba dang / yul la smond pa dang / lhar smon pa dang / tshangs par smond pa dang / nyan thos kyi sar smond pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ser smon pa 'di ni bdag la tshul dang myi 'dra'o// snyam ste/ 
204a5('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spro dpe'i yin no// de sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu tshig nub po
204a6('bum): dang / brlang bas rtag tu spyos shing brgyad kyang 'khrug pa'i sems myi byed/ rdo dbyug dang bong ba dang / mtshond kyis btab cing snun pa dang / lus kyi yan lag bshags pa dang / yan lag
204a7('bum): dang nying lag bcad kyang zhe sdang gi sems myi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni sgra thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur yongs su rtog go// gzugs thams cad dbu ba lta bur yongs su rtog go// rab 'byor de de lta
204a8('bum): yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// de sems can de dag nyid kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir
204b1('bum): le lo'i sems myi skyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ mtho ris su skye ba 'ang le lo can gis rnyed par dka' na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i chu byang chub lta ci smos kyis
204b2('bum): de bas na bdag gis nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// rtag tu brtson 'grus pa myi 'dor bar bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar yongs su rtog
204b3('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// de sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu sems 'khrug pa yin na te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
204b4('bum): de ni 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan du skye ba'ang sems 'khrugs pa so mnyes par dka' na/ bla na myed pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos kyis de bas na ta bdag
204b5('bum): gis nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdag gis sems ma 'khru gas par bya'o snyam du ste// rab 'byor de de ltar yongs su rtog
204b6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// de sems can de dag gi don du namo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i
204b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang shes rab kyi pha rol dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni 'di ltam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma zhugs par rnam pa gzhan gis skye
204b8('bum): can yongs su smin par bya ba myi nus kyis/ de bas na bdag gis shes rab 'chal ba dang ldan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang skyed par myi bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
205a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i yin no// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la tha dad ma mchis na/ shes rab kyi
205a2('bum): pa rol tu phyind pa 'di skad ces du pha rol tu phyind pa lnga ni rab ces bgyi/ gtso bo zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/ dam pa zhes bgyi/ phul zhes bgyi/ bran myed pa zhes bgyi/ gong na myed pa zhes byagyi/ mnyam/ 
205a3('bum): pa myed pa zhes bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyind pa rnams la ni/ rnam pa tha dad pa gang yang
205a4('bum): myed de gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed na ni pha rol tu phyind palnga po 'di dag gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying thob par myi 'gyurate/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la brten nas/ pha rol du tu
205a5('bum): phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyinang pa'i mying thob par 'gyur/ ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ lus rnam pa tha dad pa na mas ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du phyin na kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ro
205a6('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtend nas yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying thob par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du phyinang na 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi tu/ 
205a7('bum): kha dog du kha dog gcig par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni
205a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// zhes bya ba'i khyad par gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di dag la ji bo nyid myed pas/ de'i phyir khyad par gang yang
205b1('bum): myed do// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos la yang khyad par ma mchis pa bye brag ma mchis na/ rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ni gang zhig mchis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni/ ci'i slad du pha rol tu/ 
205b2('bum): phyind pa lnga po de dag gi rab ces bgyi/ gtso bo zhes bgyi/ mchog ces bgyi/ dam pa zhes bgyi/ phul zhes bgyi/ gya nom pa zhes bgyi/ bla na myed pa zhes bgyi/ gong myed pa zhes bgyi/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes
205b3('bum): bgyi/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dade de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ don rjes su thob par bya ba la chos gang yang bye brag dang khyad par myed do// 'on
205b4('bum): kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang brdar bya na/ sems can 'khor ba las yongs su 'don pa'i don tu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod do/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod do// bzod pa'i pha
205b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa yang yod do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ yang yod do/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yod/ do/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang yod do// sems can
205b6('bum): de dag la skye ba myed do// 'chi ba myed do// 'pho ba myed do// 'byung ba/ myed do// sems can myed pas chos thams cad myed par re ga par bya'o// rab 'byor nga rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi
205b7('bum): rom tu phyin pa ni pha rolang du phyind pa lnga po de dag gi rab ces bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ pumra zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ gong na myed pa na
205b8('bum): bya/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya/ myi mnyam dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu gling gi bud myed gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na bud myed rin po che ni rab ces bya/ gtsom
206a1('bum): zhes bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na myed pa zhes bya/ gong na myed pa zhes bya/ mnyam pa myed pa zhes bya/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya
206a2('bum): ba bzhin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rab ces bgyi ba dang / gtso bo zhes bgyi ba dang / mchog ces bgyi ba dang / dam pa zhes bgyi ba dang / gya nom pa zhes
206a3('bum): phul zhes bgyi ba dang / gya nom pa zhes bgyi ba dang / bla na myed pa bzhes bgyi ba dang / gong na myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / mnyam pa myed pa zhes bgyi ba dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba de ci las
206a4('bum): dgongs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bzung zhing myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
206a5('bum): pa nyid gang na ba der gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chos gang yang yongs su 'dzind pa 'am/ gtong ba ma mchis sam
206a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni chos gang yang yongs su gtong ba 'am 'dzind pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
206a7('bum): 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / gtong ba myed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad myi 'dzin myi gtong ba/ 
206a8('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshor ba yongs
206b1('bum): su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzin myi btong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor
206b2('bum): shes raba'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
206b3('bum): pa ni rnam pa yongs su myi 'dzin da myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni sna yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lce yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab
206b4('bum): 'byor du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lus yongs su 'amyi 'dzind/ myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab
206b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // re ba 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sgra yongs su myi 'dzin de myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni
206b6('bum): dri yongs su myi 'dzin da myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni ro yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni reg yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byo
206b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni chos yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig yongs su gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes
206b8('bum): rab 'byor kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor/ 
207a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo
207a2('bum): rab 'byo rad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab
207a3('bum): 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes
207a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'anang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab
207a5('bum): 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'o/ ngas su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las yongs su byung
207a6('bum): ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shesma rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sna'i
207a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa ni lha'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor/ 
207a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
207b1('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // nga rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni sa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni chu'i khams yongs su myi 'dzinang myi gtong ngo
207b2('bum): rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni me'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rlung gyi khams yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi
207b3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni nam mkha'i khams yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzinang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
207b4('bum): tu phyind pa ni ma rig pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam
207b5('bum): par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor dashes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mying dang gzugs yongs su / 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa
207b6('bum): ni skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes re ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor du shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa ni tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin
207b7('bum): myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni sred pa yongs su myi 'dzi nang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni len pa yongs su myi 'dzin de myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab
207b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni srid pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rga shi yongs
208a1('bum): su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ tshul khrims
208a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni
208a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes
208a4('bum): rlob kyi pha rod tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni nang pong ba nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byorashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su
208a5('bum): myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu nang pa ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni phyi nang stong pa
208a6('bum): nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa stong nyid yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtog // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ 
208a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
208a8('bum): pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi/ 
208b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong
208b2('bum): rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzinang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo/ 
208b3('bum): rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzi nang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong
208b4('bum): rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzind myi gtong ngo // 
208b5('bum): rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa da yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
208b6('bum): yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor du shes rab kyi pha ro/ da tu phyind pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni la
208b7('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa
208b8('bum): ni dbang po lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni stobs lnga yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi yan
209a1('bum): lag bdun yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209a2('bum): phyind pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gtan bzhi yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
209a3('bum): tu phyind pa ni tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor
209a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam par tha rod pa brgyad yongs su myi dzi nang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
209a5('bum): pa dgu yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong
209a6('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mngon pa shes rnams yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ting nge 'dzi nang rnams yongs su myi 'dzin
209a7('bum): myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
209a8('bum): bcu yongs su myi 'dzin dmyi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi 'jigs pa bani yongs su myi 'dzind myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyin pa
209b1('bum): dmam ga dag tu na yongs su su 'an smri gtong ngo // rab 'byor du shes ra gyi pa ma du da pa nga rje chen po yong su rgya yin gyig ca dang / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pa sa na
209b2('bum): da pa na sangs rgyas myos pa 'dres pa d+hA langs su nga myogating ngo // rab byor dgapar bya bar mdu du phyin pa rgyun tu gas pa 'bras bya yongasasu kyi 'dzin byin nga
209b3('bum): b+h+yo shes rab tu po rom tsun pa ni san cig phyir 'ong de'i 'bras bu yongs su myu la ni myi gtong po ra 'byor sheso rab tu ba ba tu byed pan byar myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu longs su
209b4('bum): 'dzinang myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang byang chub yongs su myi 'dzin
209b5('bum): myi gtong ngo // rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi bla na myed/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub semayongs su myi 'dzi/ nad myi gtong ngo / gsol pa/ bcom ldan
209b6('bum): 'das ji ltar na/ gzugs yongs su ma bzung bam btang ba lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar 'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
209b7('bum): ji ltar na 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rna ba yongs
209b8('bum): su ma bzung mi btang ba lags ji ltar na sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
210a1('bum): ji ltar na yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags// ji ltar na gzugs yongs su ma bzung btang po lags/ ji ltar na sgra yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dri yongs
210a2('bum): su ma bzung btang ba lags ji ltar na ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags
210a3('bum): ji ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma
210a4('bum): ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes payongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lu das kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung btang ba lags/ ji ltar
210a5('bum): na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma tang ba lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba legs/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus
210a6('bum): reg pa yongs sum bzung sa btang ba lags/ jis ran sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su su bzungs bdang ba lags/ ji ltar na sde'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma btung ma btang ba sags
210a7('bum): nasus kyi 'dus te rig po yongs su su bzung sa btang ba lags/ rdo ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs sum bzungs btang ba lags/ dza wAr namyig go 'dus bye shu sbyin kyis tshor ba sa
210a8('bum): ma na dus gas sa kyi dpong sa sum lungs sa/ sa tshul du
210b1('bum): lags ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na yid kyis 'dus te/ 
210b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags// ji ltar na sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khas yongs su ma bzung btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mye'i khams
210b3('bum): yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs
210b4('bum): su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ma btang
210b5('bum): ba lags/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs yongs su ma bkru/ nga ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug yongs su ma / bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang
210b6('bum): bya lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba logs/ ji ltar na sred pa yongs su mo bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lend pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na srid pa
210b7('bum): yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ri ltar na skye ba yongs su ma bzung btang ba lags/ ji ltar nin/ shi yongs su ma bzung ma bdang ba lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa yongs su ma
210b8('bum): bras nga na grags/ de na chul khrims kyi ros su phyind pa yongs sum bzung btang ba lags/ dzamAr na babod pa'i pha ros tu phyin pa yongs sum 'brings pa nga lags/ min na yo du
211a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu ma bzung ba lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su ma bzung ma 'dang
211a2('bum): ba lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na byi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar
211a3('bum): na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na
211a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lag sa/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma
211a5('bum): btang ba lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myeng ba stong pa nyid yo/ dngas su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rang
211a6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltan chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba la ga cos/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang
211a7('bum): ba lags/ ji ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma bzung ma btang ba
211a8('bum): lags/ ji ltar na dngas babyed parang ba zhid stong pa nyid yod sum bzung ma bdang b.lags/ dris pa dran panye bar bzhag pa pan yang sum 'thungs btang ba la dgas/ jis pan yang dag par spong ba pa'i sangs sus
211b1('bum): sgyu num gang bcan 'as su bzu pa lags/ de wA na yang ba ltas su pa zung sa ba lags/ da na stongs snga sangs sum dazungs bdang
211b2('bum): ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar nan 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yong sum bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yong su ma bzung
211b3('bum): ma bang ba lags/ ngasar nabs pa gtan ba ni ming su ma bzungs btang ba lags/ ji ltar nachang myed pa pan yang sum bzung ma btang bya lags/ jisar na gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa pa ni yangs su
211b4('bum): ma bzungs btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par tharang pa brgyad ni/ dngas su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par brnyad brgya yong su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par thar pa'i
211b5('bum): skra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa yongasu ma bcu'i ma btang ba lags// ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams yi su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs
211b6('bum): su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na myi 'jigs
211b7('bum): ba bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas
211b8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung / 
212a1('bum): ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma/ 
212a2('bum): btang ba lags/ ji ltar na lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
212a3('bum): rab 'byorang gzugs yid la myi byed pas gzugs yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// tshor ba yid la myi byed pas tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// 'du shes yid la myi byed pas 'du shes yongasu ma bzung
212a4('bum): ma btang ba yin no// 'du byed yid la myi byed pas 'du byed yongasu ma ba zung ma btang ba yin no// rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas rna dam par shes pa yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yino// myig yid la
212a5('bum): myi byed pas myig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin ni/ rna ba yid la myi byed pas rna ba yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yi no// sna yid la myi byed/ pas sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// lce yid la myi byed/ 
212a6('bum): pas lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// lus yid la myi byed pas lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// yid yid la myi byed pas yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// gzugs yid la myi byed pas
212a7('bum): gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yino// sgra yid la byid pas sgra yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// dri yid la myi byed pas dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// ro yid la myi byed pas ro yongasu ma bzung na
212a8('bum): btang ba yin no// reg yid la myi byed pas reg yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yino// chos yid la myi byed pas chos yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas myig gi rnam par
212b1('bum): shes pa yongs su ma btang ba yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba pa yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs/ 
212b2('bum): su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi byed pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa/

212b5('bum): te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma pa matang ba yin no// lce'i 'dus te re/ ga pa yid la myi byed pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa yong su ma bzung ma/ btang ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ 
212b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yong su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi byed pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshe
212b7('bum): ba yid la myi byed pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i sbyin gyis tshor ba yongs sum bzung ma btang ba yin no/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyand kyis tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
212b8('bum): yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lesu yid la myi byed pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongasu ma bzung / ma btang ba yin no// lce'i 'dus te/ 
213a1('bum): reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yid la myi byed pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid la mi byed pas lus kyi 'dus/

213b8('bum): ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid med la myi byed pas don mo po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yon na/ 'dus byas stong btod pa myi byed pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid yong sum bzu
214a1('bum): btang ba yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas mtha' las/ 
214a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasasu ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yid la myi byed pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yid/

214b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod la mi byed pas rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed
214b7('bum): yongasu ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams yid la myi byed pas mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la myi byed pas ting nge 'dzin rnas yongasu ma bzung ma

215a1('bum): bzung ma btang ba yin no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la myi byed pas mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su mazung ma btang ba yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa pa ni yid la myi byed pas so so yong dag par rigapa

217b6('bum): snyed kyi rnam par shes pa yid la myi bgyi// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ rna ba'i'adus te dag pa yid la myi bgyi/ snga 'dridus te reg pa yid la myi gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ lus kyi
217b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa yid la myi gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la myi bgyi// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te

218a4('bum): yid la myi bgyi/ reg pa yid la myi bgyi/ tshor ba yid la myi bgyi/ sred pa yid la myi bgyi/ len pa yid la myi bgyi yar srid pa yid la myi bgyi/ skye ba yid la myi bgyi/ rga shrI yod/

218a7('bum): nyid yid la myi bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la myi bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
